rdzogasapa// 'das pa lnga yis thams cad khyab// rdzogs pa chen po'i lta ba rdzogs// phyogs su ma lhung rgya ma chad// mtshan ma rang sar grol ba ni// snyan brgyud byin rgyud grub mtha' rdzogs// lta sgom spyod pa 'bras bu rdzogs// ye shes lnga dang sku lnga rdzogs// 'gro ba rigs drug mu stegs rtag chad rdzogs// 'gag pa med pa'i shes rab rang byung bas// mtshan ma sna tshogs dag pa'i zhing du sangs// chos min 'byed pa med pa'i klong du rgyas// ma bsgribs yongs la gsal bas na// cir yang mi 'gag phyogs ris mi mnga' bas// thams cad ma lus lus med rang snang yin// shes rab yongs gcod ma 'gags

pas// nges pa'i tshig ni mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin// dbye ba phyi nang gsang ba yang gsang yin// shes rab ldang tshad chos kun rang grol yin// 'ub chub ye shes shes pas shes rab yin// rang snang rang 'byung shes pas sbyin pa rdzogs// rig pa rang grol shes pas tshul khrims rdzogs// gnyis med zang thal shar bas bzod pa rdzogs/ chos min zang thal shar bas brtson 'grus rdzogs// thams cad thig ler shar bas bsam gtan rdzogs// snang srid lhag mthong shar bas shes rab rdzogs// chos sku rang la shar bas thabs chen rdzogs// mtshan ma rang grol stobs kyang rdzogs// snang ba rgya yan smon lam rdzogs// 'du 'bral med pas ye shes rdzogs// 'od lnga 'byung bas rin chen sna lnga rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i gdams ngag ma shes na// bong bus seng lpags gon pa 'dra/ zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa las/ rdzogs lugs kyi ngo sprod dbang bskur chen po'i le'u ste nyer dgu pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ de ni spyi yi mtshan nyid yin// rang gi mtshan nyid 'di lta ste// mig ni yul las 'das par rdzogs// rna ba sku las 'das par rdzaugs// lce ni gnyis med 'das par rdzogs// sna ni ye shes zang thal rdzogs// 'og sgo gzhi las 'das par rdzogs// tshogs brgyad thig le ye shes brgyad du rdzogs// phung po lnga ni 'das pa lnga ru rdzogs// dug lnga khong khro 'das pa lnga ru rdzogs// 'byung lnga sha khrag drod sems dbugs// 'das pa lnga ru rdzogs pas dbang chen thob// snying stod sku las 'das par rdzogs// dbus ni yul las 'das par rdzogs// smad ni gnyis med 'das par rdzogs// bub ril chos las 'das par rdzogs// rtsa rnams thams cad mkhyen par rdzogs// zur brgyad ye shes brgyad du rdzogs// thel brgyad thig le brgyad du rdzogs// shel gyi sbu gu thugs rje'i rol par rdzogs// ngo bo sku las 'das par rdzogs// rang bzhin yul las 'das par rdzogs// thugs rje gnyis med 'das par rdzogs// yon tan ye shes zang thal rdzogs// phrin las thams cad mkhyen par rdzogs// sa rnams ma lus bgrod med rdzogs// snang ba 'od gsal phyi yi tshogs lam rdzogs// tshogs drug rang grol nang gi tshogs lam rdzogs// 'gyu ba lam khyer gsang ba'i tshogs lam rdzogs// snang rig dbyer med shar bas sbyor lam rdzogs// ye shes zang thal shar bas mthong lam rdzogs// gnyis med zang thal shar bas bsgom lam rdzogs// thams cad mtshan ma rang sar grol// mthar phyin lam ni rdzogs pa'o// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa las/ dbang rdzogs rang chas su bstan pa'i le'u

ste sum cu pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu rnams// de yi ngo sprod bstan par bya// nyan thos dug lnga spangs lam yin// byang chub sems dpa' spyod lam yin// sngags kyi theg pa bsgyur lam yin// rdzogs chen gzhi lam dbyer med yin// bka' rgyud gzhi lam rang grol yin// thugs rje bkrag mdangs nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// bdag blo 'khrul pa'i blo yi mun pa bsal/ thugs rje spyan can ye shes khong nas shar// 'khor ba rnam bzhi'i srog bcad pas// th-ig le ye shes zang thal thob// gzhi dang rgyud dang lam dang 'bras bu chod// sad pa bzhi dang bdud bzhi choms pa yin// ye shes nyi ma thugs kyi klong las shar// sku bzhi rang sar grol bas bdud bzhi'i sgrib pa dag/ 'od lnga lam du shar bas 'khor ba'i rtsa ba smin/ khams gsum rtsa ba chod pas srid gsum rtse nas 'gyel// gzhi dang 'od snang bar na gnyis med shar bas yon tan ye shes lnga// yid dang 'gyu ba 'od dang gsum// rang byung rang la shar bas sku gsum lam du bslang// 'byung lnga rang byung 'od las grol ba na// lnga ldan ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// thugs rje byin rlabs mkha' la nyi shar 'dra// bskal pa bar pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs dang// thog ma'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med pa dang// tha ma'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dang gsum// bka' bgros rgyud du byin brlabs nas// sangs rgyas bka' bgros rgyud ces bya// gzhi yi chos lnga lhun grub yin// de ma shes pas 'khrul pa yin// lam gyi 'od lnga rang snang yin// de ma shes pas 'khor ba yin// 'bras bu 'khor ba rnam bzhi yin// de ma shes pas dngos po yin// gzhi shes pas ni grol pa de// thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa yin// lam shes pas ni rang byung ba// 'khor ba'i g.yang sa chod pa yin// 'bras bu 'das pa sngar grol bas// 'khor ba'i 'bras bu chod pa yin// ye shes spyan gsum gcig tu dril/ sangs rgyas spyan zhes rab tu brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa ni// gos dkar mo zhes brjod pa yin// dgongs pa phyogs med khyab pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings phyug ma zhes brjod// thugs rje'i rlan dang mi 'bral bas// mA ma ki zhes rab tu brjod// thugs rje kun la snyoms par 'char// dam tshig sgrol ma zhes bya'o// thig le'i rang bzhin shes rab snying rje ste// phyi yi khyad par theg pa che chung bstan// 'og ma rnams ni rang don spyod pa yin// sngags kyi theg pa gnyis ka spyod pa yin// rdzogs pa chen po dbye ba med pa yin// bka' rgyud 'di ni bdag don gzhan don gnyis// rang grol dbang po'i khyad par ston pa yin// thabs dang shes rab

nyan thos nyid du ltung// snying rje dang ni shes rab kyis// 'gro don ma lus byed pa po// snying rje chen po cir mi mdzad// che ba'i ye shes rnyed dka' ba// shes rab thabs kyis 'gro don byed// grol nas grol ba'i lam yang staun// lam rnams kun gyi mchog tu bshad// thun mong khyad par mchog dang gsum// log lta ma dad le lo dang// ma rig pa de lam du slong// ngo sprod sangs rgyas sa la 'god// lam gyi mchog ces bya ba'o// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa las/ ngo sprod kyi lta bsgom las grol ba'i le'u ste so gcig pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang// ye shes rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// thun mong khyad par mchog dang gsum// thun mong 'khor lo lnga la gnas// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi yod// de yang bsdus pas gsum du 'dus// de yang a ba d+hU tir 'dus// a ni tshig dbang rin po che// wa ni gsang ba'i ye shes dbang// 'a ni shes rab dbang yin no// d+hU ni thabs kyi dbang yin no// ti ni bum pa'i dbang zhes bya// thams cad 'dus pas bum pa'i dbang// tshig tu mtshon pas ming gi dbang// brgyud pa ma chad chu yi dbang// rang chos ston pas dbu rgyan dbang// zung du 'brel bas rdo rje dril bu'i dbang// rig pa'i dbang lnga zhes kyang de la bya// de ni khyad par dbang zhes bya// da ni mchog gi rtsa bstan pa// zag pa med pa'i dbang bskur te// gzhi la rtsa rlung lhun gyis grub// phra ba'i rtsa dang rig pa'i rtsa// dngos po 'khrul pa'i rtsa dang gsum// dang po'i rtsa ni zag bcas yin// de la sbyangs na bde ba skye// bde ba skyes nas lam du 'jug/ zag med rtsa ni bka' brgyud yin// gzhi yi rtsa dang rlung dang ni// thig le lhan skyes ye shes dang// lam du da lta bar do la// zag pa med pa'i ngo sprod yin// 'bras bu rang sar grol ba'o// ngo sprod shin tu gces pa yin// de yang bka' brgyud byin brgyud dang// thugs su brgyud pa'i rtsa yin pas// bskal pa 'khrugs kyang khar ma 'byin// sems can las 'phro med pa dang// 'og ma'i grub mtha'i sgor zhugs pas// dngangs shing skrag nas skur ba 'debs// de yi rnam smin 'bras bu yin// rdo rje'i dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// des na bskal par khar ma 'byin// dus ngan tha ma byung ba'i tshe// mar me 'chi kar gsal ba yin// bstan pa nub kar dam chos dar// gsal ba rang gis 'chi ba yin// dar ba rang gis nub pa yin// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa las// rtsa rlung thig le ye shes rlung gi le'u ste so gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod nyon cig/ lha rgyud rin po

che spungs pa 'di// ngo sprod dbang bskur rgyud yin te// byin gyis brlabs kyis bshad pa yin// 'khor ba dong sprug rgyud du zung// ye shes spyan gsum rgyud du zung// dbang bskur rgyal po'i rgyud du zung// ye shes rten rdzogs rgyud du zung// ye shes 'khor lo'i rgyud du zung// ngo sprod chen po'i rgyud du zung// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas gsol ba// legs so rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i mchog/ de ltar gsungs par rjes yi rang// 'khor rnams rab tu dgyes pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje che// zhes gsungs so// lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste so gsum pa'o//// lha rgyud rin po che spungs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba rdzogs so// bi ma la'i gdams pa/ bod rgyal khams yongs la btsad po che na khrims kyis che// bod 'bangs yongs la dkon mchog mnyan na bde// sngags pa kun gyis ngan sngags thub na btsun// rnal 'byor rnams kyis tshul 'chos spangs na bzang// bla ma'i gdams pa bsgrubs na grub// gtso bo rnams kyis chad las mi 'gal bzang// mo btsun rnams kyis lus khrims dam na btsun// chos skyong srung mas bstan pa bsrungs na btsun// gdams ngag srog las gces pa byas na phyi phyir btsun// slob dpon bi ma las de skad gsungs so//// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+hA Sha tan+t+ra rat+na mA lA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba// 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kun// ma rig pas ni rgyu byas nas// las dang nyon mongs rkyen dbang gis// sdug bsngal rgya mtshor chud pa rnams// sdug bsngal mtsho las bton pa ni// byang chub bde la bkod pa'i phyir// gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi snying po lhun rdzogs 'di// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// thub pa'i dbang po nyid la zhus// de don phyin ci ma log par// rjes 'jug rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// gsal byed sgron ma lta bu zhus// e ma chos rnams kun staun cing// zab cing rgya che'i don ston pa// 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi snying po lhun rdzogs 'di// mar me 'chi ka'i 'od bzhin du// bstan pa 'jig ka'i dus dag tu// rgyal ba'i thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// 'dzam bu gling gi dbus su dar// skal ldan rnams kyi sgron me byed// las dang nyon mongs gnyen po byed// dang po'i 'og min chos dbyings su// gsang sngags glu 'di rang sgrar bshad// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// sangs rgyas dpag med rnams la

gsungs// de nas lha gnas gsum du grags// sprul sku 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal gyis// lha rnams dang ni drang srong dang// rig 'dzin tshogs la bshad pa yin// tha ma 'dzam gling dbus su grags// bya rgod phung po'i ri yi 'gram// bya rkang ri yi rtse dag la// sangs rgyas bcom ldan shAka thub kyis// lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal/ khro tshogs lnga brgya dang bcas la// zab cing rgya che'i mtshan don bshad// gsang ba'i bdag po nyid kyis bsdus// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// byung tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas gsang dbang lag na rdo rje yis// ston pa la ni dri ba dris// 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi snying po lhun rdzogs 'di// bshad pa'i tshul ni ji ltar bshad// rgyud kyi don ni ji lta bu// rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// le'u'i skabs rnams du zhig mchis// le'u drug ye shes 'chang ba yi// rim gyis go rim ma mthun gang// rgyas bsdus rim pa du zhig gsungs// sgrub thabs lha ni du zhig mchis// zab mo rdzogs pa'i rim pa yi// gdams ngag gnad ni ji ltar lags// tshig gi bka' tshoms ji ltar bshad// dri ba rnam pa bcu yi don// bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// de skad zhus pa'i tshig don rnams// 'khor gyi rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal mdzod// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// 'khor gyis zhus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog// 'khor la zhal gzigs 'dzum pa mdzad// ljags brkyangs nas ni tshig gsungs pa// 'jam dpal don mtshan brjod pa yi// rgyud kyi snying po lhun rdzogs 'di// bshad tshul rnam pa bzhi yin te// chos rnams zab cing rgya che ba'i// bdag nyid du ni sangs rgyas dang// 'gro bas de ma rtogs tshul dang// thugs rje bskyed tshul nyid dang ni// de las dam chos gsung tshul lo// dam chos gsung tshul rnam bzhi ste// rgyas par gsung dang 'bring bsdus 'jug/ de las rgyas par gsungs pa ni// dug gsum nyon mongs cha mnyam pa'i// gnyen po brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la ston pa'o// 'bring ni rnam la bcu gnyis te// mdo dang dbyangs dang lung du bstan// tshig bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi'i sde// rtogs brjod de byung skyes pa'i rabs// rgyas dang rmad byung gtan la phab// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// bsdus pa sde snod gsum dag ste// mdo sde 'dul ba chos mngon no// de yang rnam pa bzhi yin te// gang gsung gang du gang gi

phyir// tshul ni ji ltar bsdus pa'o// gang ni bcu dang gnyis bshad pa'o// gang du sde snod gsum du'o// gang phyir rim pa gsum yin te// gnyen po'i don phyir gsum nyid dang// bslab gsum rgyud la skye phyir gsum// chos dang chos phyir bsdu ba gsum// bsdu tshul la ni rnam gnyis te// don dang tshig gi sgo nas so// don la rnam pa gsum bshad de// bsgom pa gtsor ston mdo yi sde// bsrung sdom gtsor ston 'dul ba yin// lta ba gtsor ston mngon pa yin// tshig bsdu rnam pa gsum yin te// theg pa che chung thun mong gsum// mdo sogs rim lnga mdo yi ste// de rjes rnam bzhi 'dul ba ste// tha ma gsum ni mngon pa'o// de ni theg pa chung ngu yin// rgyas dang rmad byung mdo yi sde// mdo sogs rgyu ni 'dul ba la// gtan la phab pa mngon pa ste// de ni theg pa chen po'i gzhung// dang po lnga ni mdo yi ste// de rjes drug ni 'dul ba yin// tha ma mngon pa thun mong gzhung// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// gang zag blo yi rim pa gnyis// theg chen thun mong ma yin pa'i// dbang du byas te bshad pa la// mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa dang// 'bras bu rdo rje theg pa'o// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// de la yang ni lnga yin te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// 'di ni 'jam dpal sku yi rgyud// zab dang rgya che'i lam dang 'bras/ khyad par bshad lugs bzhi yis bshad// thun mong bcu gnyis lugs kyis bshad// ston pa gnas 'khor dus la sogs// phun tshogs lnga yis gzhi bzung la// bshad tshul bdun gyis gnas skabs sbyar/ khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba ltar// rgyud kyi spyi khog phub te bshad// stag gi mchongs stabs lta bu yis// rgyud kyi gzhung tshogs sa rnams bcad// ngang mo gzhib pa'i 'gros lta bus// gong 'og tshig gi 'brel par sbyar// che 'gran rtsod pa lta bu yis// brgal ba lan gyis bsnyad par bya// drang dka' dbang po lta bu yi// lung gis gang zag yid ches bya// bya glag gzan 'jum lta bu yis// gdams ngag gnad phyung skal ldan dang// ru sbal nur 'gros lta bu yis// yi ge'i 'bru 'joms tshig mtha' bskyal// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// bshad thabs kyi yan lag bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ gsang ba'i rgyud kyi don bstan pa// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba'o// ldang tshad mthun dpe dgos 'brel lo// dbye ba rnam bzhir shes bya ste// tshig don sgo nas dbye ba dang// gzhi lam 'bras bur dbye ba dang// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag dang// lta spyod sgo nas dbye ba'o// ngo bo dbye las shes par bya// nges pa'i tshig ni drug yin te// phun sum

tshogs lngas 'chad phyir dang/ 'brel dang ma tshad med phyir dang// 'khrugs pa'i phyir dang rag lus phyir// gsang sngags bslab pa ston phyir ro// ldang tshad dag ni bzhi yin te// gleng gzhi dang ni gleng bslang dang// yongs su shes bya dngos po bcu// mjug tu yongs su gtad dang bzhi// de la dngos po rnam bcu ni// lta ba dkyil 'khor dbang dam dang// bsgrub pa phrin las sngags phyag rgya// ting 'dzin mchod dang rnam bcu yis// gsang sngags rgyud kyi dbye ba bstan// lta ba'i don la rnam bcu ste/ ngo bo mtshan nyid nges tshig dbye// mthun dpe rtogs thabs phan yon dang// rtogs pa'i rtags dang rtogs pa'i tshad// ma rtogs nyes dmigs sgrub byed do// skye 'gag med dang mtshan nyid gzhi// chos kyi dbyings la lta phyir dang// ming tsam snang phyir gzhir bzhengs dbye// mthun dpe rnam pa bdun du sbyar// nyi ma rdo rje rin po che// nam mkha' rgya mtsho pad+ma gser// lung dang gdams ngag rtogs pa'i thabs// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sgrib las grol// chags sdang kun bral phyogs zhen med// 'khor ba mi spang lung dang rigs// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud pa po// dkyil 'khor don la rnam gnyis te// zab pa chos nyid dkyil 'khor dang// rgya cher rtags kyi dkyil 'khor ro// chos nyid don gyi dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// skye med chos de sna tshogs don// ci yang min las cir yang 'char// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog chen po// rgya chen rtags la dgu yin te// gzhi dang ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba snang lugs sgom thabs dang// tshad dang phan yon nyes dmigs so// gzhi ni sa gzhi phung po sems// phyi nang gsang bar shes par bya// rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor dang bcas// rig pa chos nyid snying po la// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo'i 'khor// dkyil 'khor zhes ni de phyir brjod// dbye ba gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor dang// ting 'dzin rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gsum// goms dang ma goms bye brag gis// dngos dang ting 'dzin yul du snang// yang na dbang po rab 'bring gsum// chos sku longs sku sprul sku'o// bsgom pa rim mam cig car ro// rdul tshon 'dom gang gru bzhi la// ting 'dzin lcogs tshad tshad yin no// bris pas rtogs pa bskyed byed cing// bsgom pas tha mal zhen pa bzlog/ 'khor ba mi grol nyes pa'i skyon// dbang la rnam gnyis der shes bya// zab don gyi ni dbang mchog dang// rgya che rtags kyi dbang nyid do// zab pa don gyi dbang nyid do// rig pa'i rtsal dbang thob pa ste// chos nyid rtogs pa'i dbang ces bya// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// rgya cher rtags kyi dbang bskur la// rnam pa bcu

bzhir shes bya ste// rgyu dang ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba rnam grangs bskur tshig dang// thob rkyen las dang dbang bskur thabs// dus dag dang ni 'dzin byed rten// dpe dang phan yon nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni sa bon sa bon bcas// go 'phang gzhan gyi rgyud la dgod// gsang sngags kyi ni bslab pa dang// yon tan dag la dbang phyir dbang// dbye ba rnam pa bzhi yin te// bum pa'i dbang dang gsang ba'i dbang// shes rab ye shes dbang nyid dang// dbang bzhi par ni bstan pa ni// bum pa'i dbang la bcu gsum ste// dang por bzhag pa'i 'thad pa dang// dbang bskur snod du rung mi rung// skye rgyu sa bon de rnams rtags// ma thob rtags dang bskur ba'i dus// snod ngan sbyang dang nges tshig dbye// dbang skur slob dpon mtshan nyid dang// dkyil 'khor dbang gi bye brag go/ bum pa dang por bzhag pa yang// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ bum pas dri ma 'khrud byed cing// snod du rung bar byed phyir ro// dbang bskur snod du rung ba ni// gsang sngags la mos ngang rgyud bzang// bla ma la gus dam tshig ldan// de la dbang rnams rim bzhin sbyin// snod du mi rung gang zag ni// dad chung dam med rgyal po dang// rang gi bu dang chung ma la// dbang ni bskur bar mi bya'o// bum dbang skye ba'i rgyu gsum ste// rgyu yi chos kyis mi ngoms shing// 'bras bu'i chos la mos pa skye// bla ma la gus dam la gnas// thar pa thob 'dod skyes mchog des// bum pa'i dbang thob dang po yin// sa de thob pa'i rtags dag kyang// rang sems lhar gsal dam tshig ldan// byams dang snying rje rab tu 'phel// slob dpon spyir len nyon mongs chung// dbang nyid ma thob rtags dag kyang// gsang ba'i man ngag 'chal bar sgrog/ rnyed pa 'dod phyir ci yang byed// rdo rje slob dpon la smod byed// slob ma dad ldan dbang la mos// dgos pa'i rdzas tshogs bskur ba'i dus// snod ngan byung na sbyang ba'i thabs// slob dpon gyis ni sbyin bsreg dang// tsha tsha la sogs mdo yang gdon// slob mas sgrib pa rgyun gcod gdon// phyi bshags nang bshags ci nus bya// bum pa'i dbang gi nges tshig kyang// dbu rgyan la sogs rdzas rnams kun// gcig pa'i phyir dang 'dus phyir dang// spros med mtshon phyir bum pa smos// dbye ba phyi nang gsang ba gsum// rang shar brda yi bum pa phyi// rang lus rtags kyi bum pa nang// gsang ba chos kyi bum pa'o// dbang bskur slob dpon mtshan nyid ni// lta ba ma nor gdong ldan zhing// ting 'dzin lha gsal rgyud la mkhas// las dang bya ba'i thabs la mkhas// grub pa brnyes pas dbang bskur bya// 'di la dkyil 'khor du zhe na// bsdus dang 'bring dang

shin tu rgyas// bsdus pa ye shes sems dpa'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ 'br-ing ni rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham pa'o// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum dang// sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba dang// nyan thos 'jig rten gtso bo dang// dkyil 'khor rgyal po 'di ru 'dus// de la dbang gi bye brag ni// dkyil 'khor gang blang bskur thabs gang// sgrib pa gang dag gdams ngag gang// lta ba spyod pa dam tshig dang// 'bras bu dag dang brgyad yin no// dkyil 'khor rdul tshon nyid las blangs// bskur gnas slob ma'i spyi bor bskur// sgrib pa las kyi sgrib pa dang// gdams ngag skyed rim gdams ngag ston// lta ba sngags kyi nyan thos rtogs// spyod pa dam rdzas lnga la spyod// dam tshig rtsa ba gcig nyid dang// yan lag dang ni bcas pa'o// 'bras bu mi dang lha gnas su// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po thob// gsang ba'i dbang la brgyad yin te// rgyu dang gang zag dgos ched dang/ thob pa'i rtags dang ma thob rtags// srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs ma spangs// nges pa'i tshig dang bye brag go/ dka' thub sdom pas mi gdung zhing// gsang ba'i don mos skye ba'i rgyu// gang zag snod du mi rung ba// dge slong bram ze rgad po dang// dad med dam med 'dir ma yin// dgos ched mos dang gsang thub dang// gsang ba sngags kyi byin rlabs 'byung// gsang mchog rgyal po 'di thob na// gang zag rnams la mi brten cing// rgyud rnams gtsor len bsgrub la gus// dgon pa la dga' bzlas brjod grims// theg pa dman yang gtong par byed// 'di ni gsang mchog thob pa'i rtags// dman pa'i sbyor ba dang du len// gsang ba'i don la skur pa 'debs// gsang ba'i gsang mtshan sgrogs shing gshe// 'di ni gsang dbang ma thob rtags// gsang ba'i dbang mchog 'di thob pas// pad ltar srid pa'i 'dod chags spang// dngos grub 'byung ba'i gsang dbang de// kun la gsang phyir gsang zhes bya// gsang dbang bye brag dgu yin te// dkyil 'khor bskur gnas dag pa'i tshul// gdams dang sa dang blta ba dang// spyod pa dam tshig 'bras bu'o// dkyil 'khor yab yum mkha' las blang// bskur gnas slob ma'i lce la blang// sgrib pa ngag gi sgrib pa dag/ gdams ngag rang byung ye shes ston// skal pa sa brgyad non dang mtshungs// blta ba theg pa sems tsam rtogs// spyod pa sbyor sgrol la sogs pa// gsang ba'i mdzad spyod rnams la spyod// dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad bsrung// 'bras bu tshe dbang rig 'dzin 'thob// gsang sngags don kun bskyed pa'o// shes rab ye

shes dbang mchog la// rnam pa bcu gcig shes bya ste// rgyu dang snod du mi rung tshad// snod du rung ba'i tshad dang rten// de la chos ni du ldan dang/ zung du 'brel dang thob rtags dang// ma thob rtags dang bskyar chog dang// nges pa'i tshig dang bye brag go/ theg chen mchog la rab mos shing// bum dang gsang ba rnam gnyis thob// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel// de ni thob par byed pa'i rgyu// shes rab ye shes ngo bo ni// kun gyi thun mong ma yin pas// smod dang 'phya dang yal bar dor// snod du mi rung bstan mi bya// bcud mchog seng ge'i 'o ma ni// snod mchog rin chen gser snod blug/ mchog la mos shing dbang gnyis bgrod// shes rab ldan zhing dam tshig ldan// 'di ni snod du rung ba'i tshad// rten ni rang byung ye shes la// sgron mun bsal ba ji bzhin no// lus dang ngag la brten pa'i dbang// bgrod pas rnam gnyis mi rtag 'gyur// shes rab la ni chos bzhi ste// ngo bo nyid dang gsang don rtogs// ma bsgribs pa dang rnam bzhi yin// ye shes la yang rnam bzhi ste// byed pa med par rang byung dang// ye don nges par shes pa dang// rkyen gyis mi 'gyur shes bya gsal// gang gis rang byung rtogs gyur na// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel// snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin no// zhen chags med pa shes rab yin// gang gis gsang chen rtogs pa'i rtags// 'khor ba'i chos la zhen pa log/ mnyam pa'i rjes su gzhol ba'o// snying rje byang sems rab tu 'phel// dbang mchog ma thob rtags dag kyang// dbul po phyug por khas 'che 'dra// nor 'dod phyir na ngan las byed// theg pa chen por khas 'ches kyang// tha snyad 'dod phyir mi phyir 'brang// dbang ma thob ste bskur 'dod na// dad ldan tshul shes ngan song sbyong// tshul dang ldan par byin brlabs te// yang dang yang du snyoms 'jug gsal// bla ma dpe ru nam mkha' gsal// lung dang man ngag rig pas skyor// shes pa rab yin ye shes yin// de phyir shes rab ye shes so// bye brag la ni rnam pa brgyad// dkyil 'khor bskur gnas 'dag tshul dang// gdams ngag blta spyod dam tshig dang// 'bras bu bstan pa nyid dang brgyad// dkyil 'khor bla ma'i zhal las blang// gnas ni slob ma'i sems la bskur// sgrib pa sems kyi sgrib pa dag/ gdams ngag ye shes ngos bzung ston// blta ba gnyis med ye shes rtogs// spyod pa rang shugs dgag bsgrub med// dam tshig mnyam pa chen po bsrung// 'bras bu sku gsum ye shes lnga// shes rab ye shes me po che// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das// dbang bzhi pa ni de dag la// rgyas 'debs pa yi man ngag ste/ gnyis med gnyis su

med par ston// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// rang rig 'gag med 'dus ma byas// bde chen rang bzhin dngos med ston// ma skyes gsal ba ye shes sku// de yi gnas la goms par bya// dbang bskur ba dang rab tu gnas// go 'phang bsgom dang ring du sbyin// byin brlab ces bya rnam grangs so// de la dbang 'di bskur tshul dang// slob ma'i snod dang mos sbyar la// ting nge 'dzin ni rdul tshon la// brten te rim mam cig car bskur// dbang thob rkyen la rnam bzhi ste// bla mas dbang thob nus ldan dang// slob ma dad ldan yod pa la// bla ma mnyes par byas pa dang// dbang gi cho ga legs pa'o// dbang gi las ni slob ma yi// dri ma dag par byed pa'o// bskur thabs rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi ltar rdzas la brten nas bskur// nang gi rdzas gzungs brtan te bskur// gsang ba ting nge 'dzin la bskur// mthar thug gdams ngag brten te bskur// dus ni sdig pa las log pa// gsang sngags chos la mos dus so// dbang rnams 'dzin pa'i rten dag ni// dam tshig yin te nyams na yal// dpe ni gyang dang ri mo ltar// dbang rnams bskur ba'i phan yon ni// gsang sngags snod du rung ba dang// dus 'di tshun chad rgyal ba'i sras// dbang ma bskur pa'i nyes dmigs ni// nyan pa la sogs brtsam pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dam tshig don la rnam gnyis te// zab mo don gyi mtshan nyid dang// rgya che bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ zab pa don gyi dam tshig ni// rang sems mnyam pa chen po rtogs// dam tshig kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// de yi ngang las mi 'da' bar// blo dang ldan pas gnas par bya/ rgya che bsrung ba'i dam tshig la// don ni bco lngar shes par bya// rgyu dang ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba dpe dang rnam grangs dang// las dang che ba bsrung thabs dang// nyams rgyu nyams rtags spyod pa dang// bskang thabs phan yon nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni rtsa ba byang chub sems// ngo bo bsrung bar bya ba rnams// sems pa rgyun ma chad pa'o// nges tshig dam pas gsung rnams la// 'da' bar bya ba ma yin la// 'das na tshig phyir dam tshig go/ dbye ba gsum ste spyi dang ni// khyad par lhag pa'i dam tshig go/ khyad par la ni rtsa ba dang// yan lag dag tu shes par bya// dpe ni so mkhar lta bu'o// dam tshig sdom pa tha tshig ste// yal gam zhes bya rnam grangs so// las ni sdig pa spong byed cing// legs pa'i yon tan 'dzin par byed// dam tshig dag gi che ba ni// bla med dam tshig 'di nyid du// bsrung bya kun 'dus rnam par dag/ bsrung thabs g.yo sgyu med pa yis// dran dang shes bzhin bya ras bsrung// 'khor ba'i chos la chags

sdang che// chos la sgro skur phyogs 'dzin rags// dad brtson shes rab snying rje chung// gnyid dga' chang dang rang 'dod che// gsang mi thub pa nyams pa'i rgyu// 'khor dang longs spyod mi rtag dang// mdze sogs nad mang tshe tshad thung// ma nyes dgra lha mkha' 'gro'i chad// brtsam pa'i las la 'bras bu med// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs 'byung// 'di rnams dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags// dam tshig nyams pa'i spyod pa ni// rgyu la ma 'bad 'bras bu la// re ba nyams pa'i spyod pa yin// ma sbyangs mkhas par 'dod pa dang// lta ba phyogs ris nyon mongs rags// slob dpon khyad gsod sgro skur che// dam tshig nyams pa'i bskang thabs ni// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// phyi bshags nang bshags 'bad de bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// bla ma la ni 'bul ba bskyar// sku la rgyal ba'i gzugs sku bya// gsung la mdo 'don bzlas brjod bya// thugs la mtshan bcas mtshan med bsgom// mchog tu lha bsgom don la 'bad// dam tshig bsrungs pa'i phan yon ni// mchog dang thun mong dngos grub bo// nyams pa'i nyes dmigs rnam gnyis te// 'di dang phyi mar sdug bsngal 'grub// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// khyab bdag tshig chen de nyid mkhyen// gal te gsang sngags bsgrub 'dod na// dam tshig la ni gnas par bya// dam tshig dag dang mi ldan na// phyi nang sde snod kun mkhas kyang// 'dab gshog med pa'i bya bzhin te// dmyal ba'i gnas su the tshom med// bsgrub pa'i don la gnyis yin te// zab pa don gyi bsgrub pa dang// rgya che ba yi bsgrub pa'o// gnyis med don la bsgrub pa ni// zab pa don gyi bsgrub pa yin// rgya chen bstan pa bcu gcig ste// rgyu dang ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye dang bsgrub tshul rnam grangs dang// cha rkyen gang zag dmigs pa dang// phan yon dang ni nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni rang la gnas pa yi// byang chub sems kyi yon tan bsgrub// ngo bo dngos grub gnyis 'grub par// byed pa'i thabs kyi rim pa'o// nges pa'i tshig ni thabs 'di yis// dgos don bsgrub phyir bsgrub pa'o// dbye ba la ni rnam bzhi ste// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// sgrub pa'i tshul la rnam gnyis te// shes rab sgo nas cig car du// 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub pa dang// thabs kyi sgo nas rim pa yis// 'jug pa'i tshul du bsgrub pa'o// sgrub pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub pa dang// bsgrub pa nyams su len pa dang// tshul bzhin spyod dang lam la gnas// rnal 'byor brtson zhes rnam grangs so// de la sgrub pa'i cha rkyen ni// gnas dang grogs dang 'khor yo byad// phun sum tshogs pas rten pa'o// sgrub pa rten gyi gang zag ni// dad brtson dam

tshig ldan pa dang// shes rab rnying rje che ba dang/ dbang thob man ngag can gyis bsgrub// dmigs pa mchog dang thun mong ngo// phan yon 'dod pa'i don rnams kun// ji lta bar ni 'grub pa'o// ma bsgrubs nyes dmigs bstan pa ni// 'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khyams pa'o// phrin las la ni rnam gnyis te// zab pa don gyi phrin las dang// rgya che don gyi phrin las so// zab pa don gyi phrin las ni// mnyam nyid rtogs pa'i dang nas ni// las bzhi phrin las kun kyang 'grub// rgya che rtags kyi phrin las la// don ni bcu gcig shes bya ste// rgyu dang ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba ming gi rnam grangs dus// yul dang rtsom pa'i gang zag tshul// phan yon ma brtsams nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni tshad med rnam bzhi po// shes rab dang ni bcas pa'o// ngo bo bdag nyid chen po yi// thugs rjes 'gro ba phan 'dogs pa'o// nges tshig bya bar 'os pa'o// mdzad spyod bya phyir phrin las so// dbye ba bzhi la sogs pa yis// phrin las dang ni mdzad spyod dang// bya ba zhes bya rnams grangs so// dus ni 'dul ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab pa'i dus nyid do// phrin las brtsam yul bstan pa ni// spyir ni sems can thams cad la// khyad par gnod sdig dbul phongs dang// log lta can dang dregs pa can// nad dang gdon gyis nyen pa'o// bsnyen pa rdzogs shing nus par ldan// mos pa'i gang zag yin par gsungs// phrin las brtsam tshul rnam gnyis te// nang dang phyi ru shes par bya'o// nang ni shes rab ting 'dzin dang// bzlas pa dag la brten pa'o// phyi ni sbyin bsreg phur bu dang// thun dang gtor ma dkyil 'khor dang// mnan gtad spyod la sogs pa bstan// phrin las brtsam pa'i phan yon ni// bdag gzhan don ni 'grub pa'o// las ma brtsams pa'i nyes dmigs ni// bdag gzhan bar chod don mi 'grub// byed pa sems can kun don byed// sngags la rnam pa gnyis yin te// zab pa'i sngags dang rgya che'i sngags// zab pa'i sngags ni gnyis med do// gsang ba sngags zhes bshad pa yin// rgya che'i sngags la don bcu ste// sngags kyi don la bcu yis bstan// rgyu dang dbye ba ngo bo dang// nges tshig bzla thabs byed pa'i las// rtags dang mtshan nyid phan yon dang// sngags dang mi ldan nyes dmigs so// rgyu ni byang chub sems nyid de// skye 'gag med pa'i bdag nyid do// dbye ba la ni rnam gnyis te/ don nyid ye shes sgo nas dang// rtags nyid bzlas pa'i sgo nas so// don gyi sgo nas dbye ba gsum// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags so// bzla thabs dbye na bzhi yin te// rgyu ni ma nor rtsa ba'i sngags// bskyed pa rkyen dang bzlas pa

las// skul ba'i phrin las sngags dang bzhi// de la sngags kyi ngo bo ni// chos nyid ma nor ji bzhin gnas// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// de ni gsang sngags ngo bo yin// de don phyin ci ma log rtogs// de ni rig sngags ngo bo'o// rtogs pa'i don la ma yengs nas// de ni gzungs sngags ngo bo yin// bzla ba sngags kyi ngo bo ni// gsang ste ngag tu brjod ba'o// nges tshig man tra zhes pa'i sgra// shes pa skyob phyir sngags zhes bya'o// bzla ba'i thabs la rnam gnyis te// don gyi sngags kyi bzla thabs ni// rtogs shing lha bsgom yid la gsal// rtags kyi sngags la yang ni gnyis// rdo rje zhi ba'i zlas pa dang// rdo rje khro bo'i bzla thabs so// zhi ba shin tu mer chags bzlas// khro bo drag cing dar chags bzlas// de la yang ni rnam gsum ste// bsnyen pa chu bo'i gzhung ltar 'dren// bsgrub pa phu chu 'brub pa ltar// las sbyor nam mkha'i thog 'bab ltar// sngags kyi byed pa'i las bshad pa/ gsang sngags bzlas pas 'khrul rtog sel// rig sngags kyis ni ma rig sel// gzungs sngags kyis ni dran nyams sel// bzlas pa'i sngags kyis 'jig rten dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'i srog bskul te// dngos grub myur du 'byung bar byed// sngags kyi rtags ni rnam gsum ste// gsang sngags rtags ni lha pho dang/ rig sngags rtags ni lha mo dang// gzungs sngags yab yum zung du 'brel// mtshan nyid bstan pa rnam bzhi ste// shes rab dang ni snying rje nyid// gsang sngags dag gi mtshan nyid yin// shes rab dang ni ye shes nyid// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid de// shes rab dang ni dran pa nyid// gzungs sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid yin// bzlas pa sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// brjod pa sgra yi bdag nyid do// dngos grub gnyis po 'grub pa ni// de ni sngags kyi phan yon no// sngags dang mi ldan nyes dmigs ni// 'dod pa'i don rnams mi 'grub bo// sngags mchog sngags bdag rig sngags rgyal// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// phyag rgya'i don la rnam gnyis te// zab mo'i don dang rgya cher bshad// sna tshogs snang ba'i chos rnams la// skye ba med pa'i rgya yis btab// de ni don zab phyag rgya'o// rgya cher bshad pa don brgyad de// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// mtshan nyid dpe dang phyag rgya'i rgyu// phan yon ma ldan nyes dmigs so// ngo bo bdag nyid chen po'o// mtshan ma'i gzugs su gyur pa'o// sems kyis sprul pa'i mchod rdzas so// mtshan med pa yi bdag nyid do// nges tshig mu dra zhes pa'i sgra// mtshon par byed dang mdzad pa sgrub// bcings grol byed dang rgyas 'debs phyir// phyag rgya zhes ni bshad pa yin// dbye na bsdus dang rgyas pa dang// bsdus pa la ni (22)

gnyis yin te// mtshan mar bcas pa'i phyag rgya dang// mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya'o// rgyas par dbye ba rnam bzhi ste// phyag rgya che dang dam tshig rgya// chos dang las kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad bya ba// mtshan bcas phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// rang rang don las mi 'da' dang// bdag nyid chen po'i rtags su ston// mtshan med phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// cir yang ma grub ngo bo nyid// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// yongs su rdzogs pa stong bdag med// dam tshig thugs mtshan mtshan ma'o// chos ni chos kyi mtshan ma'o// las ni 'gro don mtshan nyid do// dpe ni rnam pa bzhir bshad de// mtshon dpe me dang du ba'o// mdzad pa blon po'i pho nya'o// bcing grol gar mkhan phu dud do// rgyas 'debs rgyal po'i bka' rtags so// rgyu ni byang chub sems nyid dang// rdo rje thal mo nyid yin no// phan yon bdag dang gzhan don 'grub// phyag rgya mi ldan nyes dmigs ni// bdag gzhan don min ngan song 'khyams// phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa// phyag rgya 'di ni bla na med// ting 'dzin bstan pa bcu gnyis te// rgyu dang ngo bo nges tshig dang// dbye ba bsgom thabs bsgom pa'i dpe// mi mthun phyogs dang skyon bcos thabs// drod tshad rtags dang phan yon dang// nyes dmigs bstan par shes par bya// rgyu ni rig pa byang chub sems// ngo bo gang dmigs don dag la// bsam pa rtse gcig gnas bya'o// nges tshig dran pas zin phyir ro// dbye ba gnyis su shes bya ste// zab mo mtshan med ting 'dzin dang// rgya chen mtshan bcas ting 'dzin no// sgom thabs rim dang cig car ro// dpe na rgya mtsho ri dbang dang// 'ja' tshon ri mo lta bu'o// mi mthun phyogs ni bying rgod gnyis// bcos thabs gseng dang rgod zhi la// drod tshad phyi nang gsang ba'o// rtags kyang rmi lam 'byung ba dang// dngos su 'byung ba gnyis yin te// chags sdang chung zhing mdon shes 'char// de sogs rtags ni rim gyis 'byung// ting 'dzin bsgoms pa'i phan yon ni// mtshan ma can gyis mtho ris dang// tshe la dbang ba'i rig 'dzin dang// phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin thob// zab mo mtshan med dgongs pa yis// kun bzang dbyer med sa chen non// ting 'dzin med pa'i nyes dmigs ni// 'khor ba ngan song las mi grol// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ ting 'dzin 'di ni mchog tu bsngags// mchod pa'i bye brag rnam gnyis te// zab pa don gyi mchod pa dang// thun mong spyi bshad mtshan nyid che// zab mo gnyis med ngang gnas pa// rgyal ba ngang gis mnyes pa'i phyir// mchod pa zhes ni bshad pa yin// rgya chen dbye ba don bcu ste// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba dang// dbul pa'i thabs dang gang zag

las// rdzas dang yul dang dgos ched dang// ma phul nyes dmigs bstan pa'o// de la mchod pa'i ngo bo ni// 'phags pa mnyes par byed pa yi// lus ngag yid gsum rdzas dang bcas// dmigs pa las kyi bdag nyid do// nges tshig 'phags pa mnyes byed phyir// mchod pa zhes su bshad pa yin// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin no// rnam lnga phyi la dam rdzas nang// sbyor sgrol gsang bar shes par bya// rgyas par dbye ba brgya shes bya// dbul thabs mos pa'i tshul dang ni// sgyu ma lta bu'i blo yis dbul// dbul ba'i rten gyi gang zag ni// dad pa gsum ldan lhag sems can// las kyi tshogs gsog sgrib pa sbyong// dge ba las kyi mngon 'gro ba'o// rdzas ni yon chab sogs bdun dang// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa dag/ drang srong che dgu mchod cing brjod// mchod pa'i yul ni 'jig rten dang// 'jig rten 'das pa'i dkon mchog gsum// mchod pa phul ba'i dgos pa dag/ dngos grub rnam gnyis 'byung ba'o// mchod pa lnga ni ma phul ba'i// nyes dmigs 'dod don 'grub mi 'gyur// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gi gnas// drang srong che dgus mchod cing brjod// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// gsang bcu rgyud kyi lus bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ slad du rgyud kyi mtshan smos pa// dbang po rab kyi don 'gyur phyir// 'phags pa'i don dang 'jam dpal don// mtshan gyi don dang brjod thabs don// rnam pa bzhi yis bshad pa yin// 'phags pa'i don la rnam gsum ste// byed pa'i tshig bzhi dbye sgo bzhi// thabs kyi khyad par rnam bzhi 'phags// de la byed pa'i tshig bzhi ni// gang 'phags gang las gang gis 'phags// gang dang 'dra bar 'phags pa'o// dbye sgo rnam pa bzhi dag ni// brjod bya rjod byed sgrub pa lam// mthar thug 'bras bus 'phags pa'o// thabs kyi khyad par bzhi dag ni// 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// rgyud kyi rgyal po lhun rdzogs ni// thabs mang pa dang mkhas pa dang// de bzhin slad dang myur ba yis// sngags kyi bstan pa khyad par 'phags// de yang rgyud rgyal lhun rdzogs 'di// thabs mang ba yi rgyud yin pas// ji ltar bsgrubs kyang 'bras bu 'byung// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po// thabs mkhas pa yi rgyud yin pas// ma yeng ye shes rgyun du 'char// mkhas pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// thabs sla ba yi rgyud yin pas// bka' thub sdom pas gzir mi dgos// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud

pa'o// thabs myur ba yi rgyud yin pas// bskal pa du mar bgrod mi dgos// skad cig gcig gis rdzos sangs rgyas// 'jam dpal don la rnam drug ste// rang bzhin rgyu dang bsgom pa lam// mthar thug 'bras bu rnam pa dang// gdul bya las dag snang ba yang// grub mtha' so so la grags dpal/ de la mtshan gyi don bshad pa// zag bcas zag med la sogs pa// 'khor 'das thams cad 'jam dpal mtshan// ci'i phyir 'thad pa drug yin te// khyab pa'i phyir dang sprul pa'i phyir// rang bzhin phyir dang mkhyen pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i phyir dang mnga' brnyes phyir// chos kun 'jam dpal mtshan du 'dod// mtshan gyi brjod thabs rnam gnyis te// zab pa'i don dang rgya che'i tshig/ zab pa'i don gyi brjod lugs ni// gnyis med ngang la 'jog pa'o// tshig la yang ni rnam gsum ste/ gnyis med tshul dang gnyis sngags tshul// yon tan gsum dang rnam pa gsum// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje khyod nyon cig/ 'jam dpal don gyi mtshan brjod pa'i// gsang ba rgyud kyi snying po 'di// le'u'i grangs ni bcu gcig ste// zhus dang slar gsung rigs la gzigs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i man ngag rim pa dang// ye shes drug dang rnam pa bcu// 'dud rnams kyis ni bstod pa dang// phan yon sngags dang rjes yi rang// rnam pa bcu bzhir bshad pa yin// de nas dpal ldan zhes pa nas// spyan sngar yan chad zhus pa'i le'u// de nas bcom ldan zhes pa nas// legs zhes gsol pa lan gyi le'u// de nas bcom ldan zhes pa nas// gtsug tor cher gzigs gzigs pa'i le'u// tshig gi bdag po zhes pa nas// yang dag sgyu 'phrul mngon byang le'u// 'di ltar sangs rgyas zhes pa nas// theg pa chen po'i tshul gyis mchog/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi le'u// sangs rgyas rnam par snang zhes nas// zhags pa yan chad chos dbyings le'u// rdo rje 'jigs byed ces pa nas// sgra dang ldan pa me long lta bu// yang dag bdag med ces pa nas// ye shes me lce kun rtogs le'u// 'dod pa'i don grub ces pa nas// rin chen gtsug tor mnyam nyid le'u// sangs rgyas rtogs bya ces pa nas// dpal dang ldan mchog bya grub le'u// mchog sbyin rdo rje zhes pa nas// ye shes sku nyid bstod pa'i le'u// lag na rdo rje zhes pa nas// chos kyi rgyal po phan yon le'u// A+oM sarba d+harma zhes pa nas// dz+nyA na gar+b+ha sngags kyi le'u// de nas dpal ldan zhes pa nas// kun bshad yan chad rjes su yi rang le'u// de yang bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste// dmigs par bya ba'i yul dang

ni// nyams su blangs pa'i thabs dag dang/ nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu'o// dmigs pa'i yul la rnam gsum ste// sdud pa'i 'khor la dmigs pa dang// ston pa nyid la dmigs pa dang// rigs drug 'bras bu la dmigs pa'o// nyams su blangs thabs le'u dgu// nyams su blangs pa'i 'bras bu la// rnam pa gnyis su shes bya ste// bsgrub dang bshad pa'i 'bras bu'o// bsgrub pa'i 'bras bu phan yon le'u// bshad pa'i 'bras bu rjes yi rang ba'i le'u'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// le'u'i skabs phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po yang nyon cig/ ye shes drug gi le'u bstan pa ni// de yi 'thad pa bshad bya ba// 'khor 'das lam dang 'bras bu'i chos// kun gyi rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyir// rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi le'u bshad// gti mug chos dbyings ye shes te// rab tu phye ba'i rnam grangs kun// gti mug gnyen po yin pa'i phyir// chos dbyings ye shes le'u bshad// zhe sdang me long ye shes te// rtogs pas nyon mongs ma lus 'joms/ 'joms phyir drag po'i sgra yis bshad// 'dod chags kun rtogs ye shes te// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rnams// mkhyen tshad gtso cher bshad pa'i phyir// so sor rtogs pa'i le'u bshad// nga rgyal mnyam nyid ye shes te// rin chen yon tan rigs yin pas// yon tan che ba gtsor ston phyir// mnyam nyid ye shes le'u bshad// phrag dog bya grub ye shes te// sems can kun gyi don byed pas// mdzad pa rgya cher ston pa'i phyir// bya grub ye shes le'u bshad// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// le'u drug gi ye shes kyi 'thad pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po da nyon cig/ rigs dang ye shes go rim ni// rigs drug la ni gzigs skabs su// thog mar las kyi rigs bstan pa// theg chen gzhan don gtso cher byed// sngags drug bstan pa'i skabs dag tu// thog mar pad+ma'i rigs smos la// chos kyi sbyin pa mchog yin no// gsung gis 'gro ba 'dren phyir ro// ye shes drug gi le'u'i skabs// rigs lnga ye shes lnga rnams kyi// bzhi pa'i rtsa bar gyur ba'i phyir// thog ma nyid du bstan pa yin// 'dud kyis bstod pa'i skabs dag tu// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bdag nyid// chos dbyings ye shes bstan pa yin// rtog par bya ba'i yul dang phyir// thog mar chos dbyings ye shes bshad// rdo rje rnams ni rten 'brel sbyar// de las gzhan pa'i ye shes lnga// rtogs bya rtogs byed dag tu sbyar// bsdus dang

rgyas pa'i rim pa dag/ rnam pa bzhi ru shes bya ste// dbu zhabs rdzogs pa rgyas pa yin// 'dud kyis bstod pa 'bring yin te// sngags rigs dag ni bsdus pa'i don// a zhes pa ni shin tu bsdus// bsgom mam ston yang mchog yin no// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// rigs dang ye shes kyi go rim gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba nyon// 'di la dkyil 'khor rnam grangs ni// bsdus dang 'bring dang shin tu rgyas// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// bsdus pa ye shes sems dpa'o// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ 'bring ni rigs lnga 'khor dang bcas// phyag rgya bzhi bcu tham pa'o// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum dang// sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba dang// nyan thos 'jig rten gtso bo kun// dkyil 'khor rgyal po 'di ru 'dus// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// dkyil 'khor lha'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba nyon// zab mo'i gdams ngag bshad bya ba// rnam pa dgu ru shes bya ste// rten gyi gang zag rtogs pa'i rkyen// rtogs thabs rtogs pa'i lta ba dang// bsgom dang sa mtshams rgyu mtshan dang// 'bras bu thugs rje'i mdzad pa'o// 'di la 'jug par byed pa yi// gang zag mtshan nyid bcu gcig ste// dad brtson shes rab snying rje dang// the tshom med dgus 'chi ba dran// gtong phod sgyu med dang tshul bzang// byang chub mchog gi rigs yin pas// dad cing gus la man ngag sbyin// lung rigs man ngag rtogs pa'i rkyen// thabs ni thos bsam rnam pa gnyis// lta ba bshad sgom sngar bshad mtshungs// de yang chos sku'i rang bzhin te// skye 'gag med pa'i mtshan nyid can// kun tu bzang po'i ngo bo nyid// dge mi dge las grub pa min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa'o// mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa'i rgyu// gsal bar snang ste brtags na stong// rang ga rang rig 'dus ma byas// skyon bral bde ba chen po'i ngang// rang bzhin dngos med stong pa'i dbyings// yon tan ma 'gags cir yang yin// chos nyid nam mkha' chen po ste// thogs pa'i reg bya kun dang bral// thog ma med pa spros med bdag/ de bzhin nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs cir yang snang// thabs kyi thugs rje 'gag pa med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang// snang tshad thams cad 'jam dpal sku// grag tshad thams cad 'jam dpal gsung// dran

rtog thams cad 'jam dpal thugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung yang yin// bsgom pa'i thabs la rnam lnga ste// gnas lugs shes bya la brten nas// skye med don la bsgom pa dang// snang ba yul la brten nas ni// rang grol nyams su blang ba dang// brtol skyes yid la brten nas ni/ thug phrad lam du bya ba dang// dkyil 'khor dag la brten nas ni// lha snang lam du khyer ba dang// rtsa rlung dag la brten nas ni// bde ba lam du bya ba'o// mngon sangs rgyas pa'i sa mchis kyang// phal cher srid pa bar ma dor// dbang po rab la bar do med// 'bring ni srid pa'i bar dor grol// tha ma la ni las 'phro 'thud// de yang rgyu mtshan drug yin te// snying po kun la khyab phyir dang// ma nor rtogs nyid bya phyir dang// rnal 'byor goms par bya phyir dang// 'da' kar nyon mongs ma dkrugs phyir// lus gnyis sgrib g.yogs bral phyir dang// khyad par dran pas gsal phyir ro// mthar thug 'bras bu bshad bya ba// sku gsum dang ni ye shes lnga// thugs rje mdzad pa'i khyad par ni// rgyun chad med par chu bo ltar// byed pa sems can kun don byed// ngag don bkod pa'i tshogs dag kyang// dang po gzhal bya dgod pa dang// bar du zhi ba tshogs rnam par bshad pa dang// tha ma rjes bzlas bdag don rig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba las// zab mo gdams ngag gi gnad bstan pa dang bka' tshoms bshad pa'i thabs kyis mjug bsdu bar bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// le'u dgu yis bstan pa'o// mtshan yang dag pa'i bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so//// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i bshad rgyud rin po che'i phreng ba zhes khog don bka' tshoms rnam par bshad pa// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang// bod kyi lots+tsha ba gnyags dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab nas bod kyi yon bdag rje rgyal po la gtad pa'o// des nyang ting 'dzin la gtad pa lags so//// rgya gar skad du// many+dzu shrI A sha ya sa mu da ya ma hA man+t+ra tan+t+ra nA ma// bod skad du// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa gsang sngags chen po'i rgyud ces bya ba// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// me ri 'bar ba'i rtse mo sri la mu kha la sogs pas rnam par spras pa'i gnas na// pad+ma kha dog kun tu 'bar ba'i gdan la// sku gsung thugs 'jam dpal bdag nyid can du gyur pa'i rdo rje sems

dpa' bzhugs te// lag na rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa// 'jig rten pa dang// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyis bskor te// thabs gcig tu 'khod pa ni// nges pa'i don gyis tshogs pa dang// nges pa'i don sgrogs pa'i phyir// 'khor gnyis su 'dus so// de nas lag na rdo rjes 'khod pa rnams kyis bsam pa mkhyen te// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// 'gro ba'i bla ma ston pa po// dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa mkhyen mchog gis// bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku// gtsug tor chen po tshig gi bdag/ ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ don zab don ni rgya che zhing// don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyis// glur blangs pa ni gang lags pa// dgongs pa 'dus don gsung du gsol// gsung 'dzin ci nas bdag gyur phyir// nges par 'byung ba'i bar du 'di// bdag gis bsam pa brtan pos gzung// nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang// mi shes ma lus spang pa'i phyir// sems can rnams la bshad par 'tshal// zhes zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs nyid kyi gsang mdzod sgo phye ste// ye shes rlung gi bum pa dril// ljags kyi rtse nas gsung gi 'od 'phro ba// ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing// bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa// sems can rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' yi// ming ni yang dag brjod pa'i mchog/ dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// de yi dgongs pa 'dus pa'i don// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang// 'jam dpal dgongs pa ngas bshad do// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las// gleng gzhi dang mtshan gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs zung zhig/ gsang sngags phyi nang bskyed rdzogs gnyis// mtshan brjod nyid du 'phro zhing 'du/ 'di ru de yi dgongs pa 'dus/ gsang sngags 'bras bu lam khyer lnga// sku gsum ye shes lnga yi bdag/ ye nas lhun grub ma shes par// so so'i yan lag yig 'bru bskyed// mtshan ma'i chos la blo zhen pas// yang dag lam mchog de ma bskyed// de yang zag bcas 'jig rten

la// lhun grub sku yi don bstan pa// chos sku dngos med zang thal la// dri ma mi gnas rnam par dag/ de yi mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga// stong dang mi 'gyur yon tan 'byung// rtsal 'byin thogs pa med pa las// ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa// ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ shes rab rig pa'i sku lnga gsal// de la gdul bya rnam gnyis pa// gcig las mi g.yo sku gnyis snang// so sor mi gnas gcig gi ngang// so so rang rig mi g.yo ba// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// zhi ba'i thabs kyi gdul ba la// ye shes bum pa'i klong yangs su// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid can// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// ye shes snang ba lam me ba// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// gzi brjid chen por lta na sdug/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// ye shes gdangs kyi phung po lnga// lnga yi bdag nyid bcu ming can// sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag 'dzin pa// dri med dag pa'i mkha' la gsal// byad dang me long dus mtshungs kyang// g.ya' dang dri ma ma dag pas// byad bzhin rnam pa gsal mi nus// me long g.ya' dang bral ba la// byad kyi dri ma dag pa gsal// chos nyid rig pa ma bral yang// 'byung ba phra rags rnam pa dang// sems rtog phra rags rnam pa gsum// chod pas sku dang dngas ma gsal// gnyis po phra rags lnga dag nas// btsal dang 'ong ba med bzhin du// rtog med ye shes snang ba gsal// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// rnam par dag pa bdag med chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a las byung// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spang ba ste// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che// sems can ma lus dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod pa chen po khro ba che/ khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad 'joms pa po// med pa las byung khyod la 'dud// nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ sku yi cha lugs bstan pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// gdul bya khro bor snang ba la// thugs rje

rang byung dkyil 'khor shar// don la tha dad yod pa min// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// sprul sku mthun par snang ba'o// rig pa chos nyid dbyer med pas// dri ma drug bral chos kyi sku// de nyid phra rags dri ma dag/ phra zhing zag med sa bon bral// de yi mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga// rig pa shar ba rigs lnga'i sku// gdul bya la snang 'byung ba bzhi// 'byed med shes rab sku gsal bas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mi gnas pa// mkhyen pa'i ye shes phyag rgya gsal// lus med lus te lus kyi mchog/ lus kyi mtha' ni rtogs pa po// gdul bya la snang ye shes sku// nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// ye shes kyi ni dngas ma la// yon tan sku lngas rab tu brgyan// 'di ni rtags dang cha 'dzin sku// chos sku ye nas gzhi nyid la// longs sku mkhyen pa'i shes rab ste// sprul skus phyir gsal don byed nus// mthing ga'i bum pa me long ye shes snang// snang mdzad bud+d+ha he ru ka/ smug nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag drug zhabs bzhi gdangs shing bsgrad// mthing ga bum pa me ri mthing nag snang// mi bskyod badzra he ru ka/ mthing nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyag drug zhabs bzhi gdangs shing bsgrad// ser po bum pa me ri ser nag snang// rin chen 'byung ldan he ru ka/ ser nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag drug zhabs bzhi snga ma bzhin// dmar po bum pa me ri dmar nag snang// snang ba mtha' yas pad+ma he ru ka/ dmar nag dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag drug zhabs bzhi snga ma bzhin// ljang gu bum pa me ri dmar nag gsal// don yod grub pa karma he ru ka/ ljang nag bum pa dbu gsum 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag drug zhabs bzhi gdangs shing bsgrad// kun gyi phyag mtshan rnam pa gsum// ye shes rang rtags phyag mtshan dang// gdul byed dpa' rtags phyag mtshan dang// phra men rbod gtong phyag mtshan rnams// so so'i rtags dang cha 'dzin pa// ye shes rang rtags so sor snang/ khro bo'i lus kyi gzugs ldan pa// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/ kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ral pa mun dza cod pan thogs// shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste// ye shes me lce 'od 'bar ba// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed// bdud kyi dpung rnams pham byed pa// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad+ma gar gyi bdag/ brtan po mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa brgya po kun bskyod cing// gom pa'i stabs kyis gar byed pa// dpal ldan lag pa brgyas gang ba// nam mkha' khyab pa'i gar byed pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i stobs chen ldan// rdo rje 'jigs byed

'jigs par byed/ khro bo rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha la ha la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal// rdo rje shugs can 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje grags pa rdo rje snying// sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus po che// rdo rje las skyes rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje snying po mkha' 'dra ba// mi g.yo ral pa gcig gis bsgyings// glang chen ko rlon gos su gon// drag chen ha ha zhes sgrogs pa// hi hi zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gad mo chen mo gang rgyangs che// rdo rje gad mo cher sgrogs pa// rdo rje hU~M ste hU~M zhes sgrogs// mtshon du rdo rje'i mda' thogs pa// rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod// rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje 'bar ba mig mi bzad// skra yang rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i mig/ lus ni rdo rje'i ba spu can// sen mo skyes pa rdo rje'i rtse// rdo rje'i snying po pags pa mkhregs// rdo rje'i phreng thog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste// gad rgyangs ha ha nges par sgrogs// 'di ni thugs rje rang byung ste// zhi ba'i sku las ma g.yos par// gdug pa can la de ltar snang// lhun grub sku ni dung khang du// ma bskyed rdzogs pa'i klong na gsal// gcig ni rin chen klong na gsal// gnyis ka ye shes sgo bzhir rgyu// sems can don la sgo gsum rgyu// ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan du thogs// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ sku zhi khro gnyis su bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// skye med don rtogs rab tu dga'// blo yi the tshom kun dang bral// des na gnyis pa dri ma med// thun mong thugs rjes don mdzad pa// ji bzhin rnam bzhi ma nor ston// 'di ni gsum pa 'od 'phro'i sa// gdul bya la snang mngon sum pas// rang shar thugs rjes don mdzad pa// de ni bzhi pa 'od byed sa// ye shes gdangs dang yon tan sku// gnyis pa dag tu snang ba yin// de ltar don mchog nges thob pas// snod bcud mi gnas rang grol te// rnam rtog dri med sa la gnas// lnga pa sbyang dka'i sa non pa'o// dri med sku dang ye shes rnams// rlung dang bral ba'i mar me ltar// ji bzhin gsal ba mngon gyur pas// zag bcas 'bras bu las 'phags nas// lhun grub mngon du gyur pa'i tshe// bdun pa ring du song ba'i sa// don chen de la 'gyur med pa// ja log rnam gsum don gnas pas// 'gyur med zang thal brgyad pa'i sa// chos nyid dri ma gsum dag pa'o// lnga dag drug gi mtshan nyid la// rig pa dri med snying por shar// 'bras bu dri med sku gsum

gsal// shes rab sku yis mtshams sbyar nas// dri med sku gsum 'du 'bral med// gdul bya 'od kyi sku mi 'gag/ sku gnyis bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// 'di ni dgu ba legs pa'i blo gros sa// 'khor rnams chos la rig dbang bskur// 'di ni sa bcu non pa ste// de dag 'gyur med zang thal la// chos kyi sku ste bcu gcig pa'o// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug ste// sa bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ sbyang du med pa'i sa bcu bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje nges zung zhig/ gsang sngags mthar phyin pha rol phyin pa bcu// mi gnas phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab las// phyogs med yon tan 'khor 'das gnyis su shar// nyi ma'i snying po rin chen bzhin// chos nyid phyin par chos can sna tshogs snang// rgyan dang rol par snang ba'o// bzhi gsum mtshan nyid dang ldan pas// 'byung bzhi ma 'gags sa gzhi bzhin// de las lhan cig skyes pa dang// kun tu brtags gnyis snga phyi'i tshul// 'khrul pa'i rgyu ste sa bon bzhin// rkyen bzhis mthun pa'i phan rkyen byas// dper na chu dang lung bzhin no// 'khrul gsum 'bras bu'i rtsi thog bzhin// sprul pa'i sku yi zhing khams so// de ni 'khor ba spyi sar shar// gzhi gsum dag pas 'bras bu rnam pa gsum// rgyu dang rkyen gyi pha rol phyin pa yin// chos sku gnyis med 'gyur med pas// longs sku shes rab sku lngar shar// gdul bya dag la ye shes sgyu ma'i sku// rang la med par gzhan ltar snang ba gdul byar sku// byad dang me long ji bzhin du// sku gsum 'du 'bral med par shar// de ni myang 'das spyi sar shar// chos can spyi sar btang ba chos can nyid du grol// rgyu rkyen gnyis kyi pha rol phyin// mi gnas dmigs med shes rab klong du btang// sbyin bdag chen po gtso bo yin// chos nyid 'byung ba'i dri ma dag/ rig pa sems kyi dri ma dag/ chos sku mtha' yi dri ma dag/ shes rab mtha' yi dri ma dag/ ye shes sku la yid dang mtshan ma dag/ sprul pa'i sku la reg bya nyon mongs dag/ zhi ba'i sku la phyogs ris dag/ nyag gcig don la phyogs ris dag/ zang thal don la skye 'gag med// rang byung don la 'dus byas dag/ lhun grub don la re dogs dag/ dag pa'i de dag kyang ni logs na med// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhig/ nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// mchog tu gyur ba sems dpa' nyid// de yi 'dod pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i chos// dus gsum bde gshegs kun gyi yum// sems dpa' sems ma tshogs kyi mes// rang rdzogs lhun grub dus gsum 'gyur ba

med// 'du 'bral med pa'i lam chen ma rtogs par// mtho ris bgrod pa'i lam des nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'gyur// 'gyur med sa bcur rang rig ma rtogs par// rtsol sbyangs sa bcus rtsol bsgrub mtha' lhung ste// a ti bya bral don dang 'gal bas gol// pha rol phyin bcu rang shar ma rtogs par// byang chub 'dod pa de la byang chub ga la yod// bde ba 'dod pa de la rgyab kyis phyogs// gnas skabs bde bas mi bslu mthar thug 'bras bu med// de phyir mthar thug gsang sngags pha rol phyin pa'i don// ye nas lhun grub rang rdzogs chen po yi// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni ma btsal bsags pa po// 'phral la ma bsags ye bsags chen po la// sku gnyis phyir dang bar du snang// bsod nams tshogs zhes de la bya// chos sku zang thal 'gyur med la// ye shes tshogs zhes de la bya// de ni tshogs lam nges pa'i don// sbyor ba'i lam ni 'di lta ste// sku dang ye shes rang rig nyid// gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yod// ji bzhin rtogs pa phra ba yis// rang las shar zhing rang las grol// snang ba sum sbyor dbyer med pas// mthong lam ye shes rtogs pa shar// rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// phra rags gnyis pos ma bsgribs pas// chos nyid dag gsal snang ba mthong// sems nyid rang snang nam mkha' la// phra rags gsum pos mi bsgribs pas// dri med rig pa'i snying po mthong// de nyid dbyer med zang thal la// mtha' bzhi phra rags dri ma gsum// ma bsgribs chos sku ji bzhin mthong// de ni chos sku mthong ba'i lam// de yi mtshan nyid sngar grags pa// dngos mtshan yid kyis ma bsgribs pas// rig pa dag la ma 'gags par// shes rab ngo bo skur gsal mthong// des ni longs sku nges mthong lam// stong pa reg bya ma bsgribs par// gdul bya la snang sku lnga mthong// sprul sku nges par mthong ba'i lam// glo bur ma rig ma bsgribs par// de ltar gsum nyid ye shes lnga// lnga nyid dri med sku gsum 'dus// ye nas ji bzhin gnas lugs mthong// de ni ye shes nges mthong lam// de ltar don mthong 'du 'bral med// dbang po rab la dgongs pa gsal// 'bring la bsgom pa'i thabs mchog gsal// lta bsgom stobs kyi khyad par gyis// lta ba'i gdengs gnas bsgom lam gnas// bsgoms pas dngos po de bzhin nyid// de ni bsgom pa zhes bshad na// dri med sku dang ye shes mngon 'gyur bas// de ni 'bras bu+u rang rdzogs te// mthar phyin lam te ja log gsum// des ni bgrod med lam chen lnga// nam mkha'i lam la rab tu gnas// zhes gsungs so// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ gsang sngags kyi don lam bstan pa'i le'u ste

bzhi pa'o//// de nas ston pas 'gyur ba med pa'i sa bcu bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhig/ rang bzhin dag pa'i nam mkha' la// dri med dag pa'i chos sku mthong// ye shes sgrib pa'i dri ma la// gdul bya las snang sku gnyis snang// bar du shes rab sku lnga mthong// mtshan nyid lnga ldan ye shes mthong/ khyad par 'phags pa'i don chen po// rang la mthong bas rab tu dga'// chos nyid mthong bas 'byung ba'i dri ma med// rig pa'i don mthong mtha' bzhi dri ma dag/ shes bya'i sku mthong yid dang mtshan ma dag/ sprul pa'i sku mthong stong pa reg bya'i dri ma dag/ ye shes don mthong glo bur ma rig dag/ don rnams nges mthong blo yi the tshom bral// don phyir rang gi rig pa rang gis rig/ lus kyis ma bsgribs ye shes sgo nas mkha' la 'char// shar yang dngos po med de spros med thig le'i don// nyams shar ba dang goms pa ka nas dag/ tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog/ gong ltar sbyin pa rnam gnyis cir rtsal yang// dri med snying po rang snang mtshan ma med// dri ma med pas tshul khrims mchog/ zhes gsungs so// tshul khrims kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rang rig dri med chos sku la// rig pa'i sku dang 'od kyi sku// ma btsal ye nas lhun grub pas// bya byed 'bad rtsol mi gnas par// 'bras bu sku dang ye shes smin// rgyu nyid ma bcos 'bras bu rdzogs// brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin// byar med rang byung ye sangs rgyas// brtson 'grus kyi le'u// 'gyur med rdo rje'i gdan la 'byung zhing zad// phra rags dri ma dag pas sangs rgyas yul med de// rig pa dri med zang thal shes rab gsal// rang snang ye shes gzhan snang rtog pa med// gzung 'dzin rtogs pa bde chen chos kyi sku// bzod chen ma lus 'chang ba brtan pa po// bzod pa'i le'u// dgongs pa bsgom du med par rang lugs chen por gnas// bsgom bya sku dang ye shes rig pa'i ye shes nyid// dus gsum dus med rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// sgo lnga'i rtog pa skye 'gag 'char zhing nub// snying po zang thal nyid de skye 'gag med// dus gsum 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// tha snyad ming yang mi gnas 'gyur med de// nam mkha' gud bcad ma phub zang thal ltar// spros med thig le shes rab sgo nas shar// 'o ma'i snying po rtsi mar khyab pa ltar// nam mkha'i rang la chos skus khyab pa dang// gdul bya la snang ye shes sku dang chas// dri med chu la snang ba rang bzhin med// snang stong dbyer med bdag nyid chen po yin// bsgom zhing bsgrub pa'i chos min ye gnas pa// lhun grub nyam nga med pa'i bsgom pa dengs// thabs kyis bying rgod gsal du med pa ste// ngang gis mtshan nyid zhi bas bgrod pa

med// rang bzhin don la bying rmugs med par gsal// bying rgod blo la snang ba chos kyi dbyings// sems las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// gsal 'grib skye 'gag med pa'i don// g.yeng ba 'phro 'du mi gnas par// rgod pa rags pa bying ba 'phra ba gnyis// gdod nas rnam dag sangs rgyas dgongs pa yin/ de bzhin pas ni bcos shing bsgrim pa dang// rig pa'i rtsal sbyang ched du 'phro ba med// 'di ltar snang ba kho yi rtsal yin mod// lus la 'char ba'i sgo ni rnam pa gnyis// 'dod pa'i sgo nas shes rab 'char du med// ye shes sgo nas sku dang ye shes 'char// 'dod pa mi 'byung rang bzhin shugs kyis snang// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// de ltar ma rtogs blo zhan bsgom pa'i tshe// thun mong khyad par lus ngag bya ba btang// rkyen gyis bying pa de yis sel bar 'gyur// yid kyi bya ba btang ba'ang de bzhin te// rkyen gyis rgod pa zhi ba'i thabs// nad khams shes pa'i khyad par rang bzhin gyis// bying dang rgod pa byung na gang na gyi na bya// de yis mi sel bying rgod skyon ma bstan// yon tan lus pas de nyid rang la rlabs// rlung gi rta la yid kyi sgra gsum bskyon// skar mda' bzhin du chos nyid mkha' la 'phang// thog dang 'dra ste seng ge 'bru tshugs lta// 'gul dgus gcod dang bral nas dus mtshungs gnad// nam mkha' dag la khyung lding dang 'dra ste// rtsol bral mkha' la klod la bzhag/ gzer btab 'dra ste yang yang goms par bya// tshad phyin dgongs pa gangs la nyi ma shar ba bzhin// blon po btson du bzung ba 'dra ste blo yi rtog pa zhi// sgo lnga yul la mi 'phro dgongs pa mtha' bzhir gnas// dngos po blo ltar snang ba slob pa'i thabs// don dang mthun par gyur pas dngos po blo yi thog tu grol// blon pos dmangs grol dmangs kyi bya ba bral// ngang dngas rang bzhin bdag nyid chen por lhun gyis grub// sku dang ye shes bsgom par gsal ba'i don// ting 'dzin blo ltar snang ba rang gsal rig dang rgyud rig pa// ma bcos ting 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog/ rang byung bsam gtan bsam bya blo ldan pa// ye nas bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can// de ni bsam gtan pha rol phyin pa'o// rang byung shes rab ye shes 'gag med rang shar bas// dbyer med shes rab gzhi la gnas pas 'byung// thos pa'i don rig rnam par 'byed pa dang// bsam pa'i don rig so sor phye ba dang// 'dus pa las byas ma byung don chen rig/ bsgom pa shes rab mi rtog shes rab gsal// bsgom pa'i don la mi gnas so sor 'byed pa dang// dgongs pa'i don la mi gnas shes rab thog tu bab// thos pas shes rab rgyud la skye ba'i thabs// ngo sprod rtogs pa thob 'gyur

pas// mi bslu nges pa'i bden pa bzhi// sku gsum 'du 'bral med par gnas// sprad pa'i yul de rang la gnas// bden pa mthong ba'i thabs chen bzhis// don gyi sku gsum ngo sprad pas// lhun grub sangs rgyas nyid du shar// rtags kyi sku gsum ngo sprad pas// 'bras bu tshe 'dir bden pa mthong// sku gsum ja log ngo sprad pas// 'bras bu grub pa tshad du phyin// dpe yi sku gsum ngo sprad pas// don gyi sku gsum nges pa rnyed// shes pa brgyad po rtog pa 'chang// ji bzhin gzhi la mtshon pa'i thabs// ji bzhin rnam gnyis brda dang ngag/ gnyis po gzung 'dzin ya brgyad de// rtogs pa'i ye shes shar ba ni// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis ldan// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rtog pa'i ye shes rnam bzhir shar// dgos ched 'bras bu+u ji bzhin no// rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam pa sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ rgyas dang bsdus pa'i bye brag gis// dpe don rtags dang rnam pa gsum// don gsum the tshom med pa yin// shin tu bsdus na gdams ngag nyid// de rnams shes rab ldan mig yin// bsam pa'i don 'byung de dag las// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid rtogs// de mthun shes rab nges pa rnyed// goms pa'i shes rab gong du bstan// shes rab chen po'i don rig na// chos kun 'gyur ba med pa'i don// longs sku shes rab rig pa'i sku// mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur// sprul sku gdul bya la snang don byed nus// de gsum phyogs lhung med pa'i shes rab la// dbyer med shes rab rang gsal na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i don// dang po'i chos sku rig par shar// rig pa'i ye shes 'od du gsal// de las sku dang lus 'byung bzhi// srid pa'i gzhi ni mi gnas gzung// chos sku ye shes gdangs dang bcas// phyi nang med pa'i ye shes gsal// de la rtsa gnyis las shar bas// gcig tu mkhregs te lte bar 'gyur// de las lus byings rnam pa bskyed// 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig po// mi 'gyur 'byung ba rnam pa lnga// rang gsal ye shes 'byung ba shar// dang po'i 'byung ba de las 'byung// snyigs ma rags phra'i dngas mas skyed// ma rig sbubs 'thum bag chags smin// sku gsum thugs rje sbubs kyi thog tu shar// shes rab bzhi ni so sor rtog pa'i don// shes rab dri med ngos bzung ba// gzung la sgrib pa nyon mongs yod// yid kyi rnam shes shes rab gcod la sgrib// de ni shes rab dri ma can yin te// dri med shes rab zag 'khrul rnam par dag/ zag pa zag byed ma 'khrul zag med rtogs// ma rig sgo nga lta bu'i sbubs 'byed pa// ma bcos shes rab mtshon chen 'chang ba ste// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs nas 'dzoms// nyon mongs mi shes (23)

g.yul ngo sel// shes pas srid 'byung skye gnas med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma bral// shin tu sad pa sad pa'i bdag/ kun shes kun rig dam pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// srid pa'i ri bo chen po 'joms// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye ba kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa gtan spangs pa// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi ba zhi ba nyid// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba// skad cig gcig gis rdzogs sangs rgyas// skad cig thams cad bye brag byed// ces gsungs so// gsang sngags thabs kyi rgyal po ni// bya btsal mi mnga' rtogs thob thabs// spangs pa med dang nyung zab ste// mkhas pa chen po thabs che ba'i le'u'o// stobs kyi 'khor rnams sna tshogs snang// sna tshogs gnyis med ngang du sbyor// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs dang ldan// shugs chen mgyogs pa chen po ste// rdzu 'phrul chen po cher grags pa// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa po// sku dang ye shes rang la 'bar// rang shar rang la rnam par brgyan// de ni 'bras bu rang rdzogs yin// yid bzhin 'bras bu chen po 'chang// dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ byed pa sems can kun don byed// theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don la ston pa po// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ mi gnas ye shes gsal la rtog pa med// rnam dag ye shes zang thal gdangs dang bcas// chos sku zang thal chos dbyings ye shes nyid// rig pa ma 'gags me long ye shes nyid// shes rab gsal bas ye shes kun rtogs lnga// chos sku longs sku ye shes gnyis su snang// gdul bya la snang sku dang ye shes chos// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes yin// sku gsum dbyer med mnyam pa nyid/ ye shes ye shes khyad par che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// zhes gsungs so// ye shes kyi le'u'o// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa las// spyad du med pa pha rol tu phin pa bcu bstan pa'i le'u'o// 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi don shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa nges zung zhig/ sku yi don dang shes rab kyis// sngags dang mtshan nyid dgongs pa la bzla'o// de yi bskyed pa'i rim pa ni// rim pas rtsol ba sbyong 'dod pa// ma skyes lhun gyis grub pa des// rtsol bral 'du 'bral med par bstan// 'di ru rdzogs rim mthar thug don// la bzla thugs kyi dgongs pa bshad// chos sku zang thal dngos po med shes pas// rdzogs rim skye ba med pa khas blangs kyang// wa sprel seng ger brdzus pa

bzhin// dngos med zang thal chos sku ma rtogs par// blo yi zhe 'dod tshul 'chos lha la blta// 'di ni gsang sngags phyi nang gnyis dang ni// mthar thug a ti'i don mchog ma rtogs par// mu stegs rtag pa'i cha mthun gol sar lhung// 'jig rten bzhin bzang gzugs khams lha ru skye// gzugs sku rnam gnyis 'du 'bral med par ma shes par/ sangs rgyas sku gsum ye shes khas 'ches pas// spre'u bzhin ngan rgyal por brdzus pa bzhin// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i don shes pas// blo yi ye shes rgyun sbubs phyogs su gzhol// chos nyid ye shes gdangs chen ma shes pas// cha mthun gol sa mu stegs chad ltar lhung/ lam mchog 'bras bu gzugs med lha ru skye// phyogs re gang 'dzin sems nyid dgongs pa yin// ma bsgoms ye nas lhun grub ma shes par// bsgom pa'i bag chags brtas pa 'bras bur 'dod// nyon mongs dri ma dag pas ngan song rnam gsum med// shes bya'i dri ma dag las 'bras bu sangs rgyas yin// kun gyis rang snang sa dang lam la 'jug/ sangs rgyas nyag gcig gnas lugs ma shes pas// thar pa'i dus med 'jig rten gsum las yongs mi 'da'// nyag gcig rang snang sku gsum 'du 'bral med// shes rab sku yi don chen ma rtogs par// mtshan bcas lha la ltos pas 'ching bar gyur// gdul bya la snang sku mdog ma rig par// shes rab sku yis gzhan don nus pa min// kye kye rdo rje 'dzin pa ma nor zung// dus gsum bde gshegs thugs dgongs ma nor bar// chos kyi sku ste 'bras bu'i sku mi 'gag/ chos nyid rang gsal dri ma gsum dang bral// dri ma rnam gsum 'byung ba ma yin te// rig pa sangs rgyas zhing khams gzhan mi bsgrib// phra bas 'dul te ye shes rang gdangs 'od mi 'char// phra ba'i phra ba bag ste gdul bya la snang sku mi 'char// chos nyid mi mthong yon tan 'char mi nus// chu dang me long g.ya' dang rnyog mas bslad cing bsgribs pa bzhin// sbyang zhing dgag dang sbyang bsgyur mi dgos par// rtogs pas mi gnas rang dbang chen por 'gyur// nyi ma shar nas mun pa mi gnas bzhin// rig pa'i ye shes gsal la mi rtog sems kyi dri ma med// rig pa sgo lnga yin te du+u ma mang pas rang rig gcig tu bslad// mtshan ma dang bcas skye 'gag bcas pas dngos med skye 'gag med pa bsgrib// phra ba yin te phyi nang med pas yid kyi rnam shes dag gis bslad// gzung 'dzin bral bas rig pa'i don ma mthong// 'dzin med rang gsal nyon mongs yid kyis bslad// ye shes rang snang dgongs pa des ma mthong// de yang rtog pas mi rnams mun khang mar me bzhin// dri ma drug la drug bral khyab gdal 'ub chub

pas// phyi nang mtha' dbus med pa'i gnyis med bde chen chos sku zang thal yin// mtha' bzhi dri ma phrad dang rags pa gnyis po yin// rags pa yod na rtag mtha' dngos med spros bral bsgrib// phra ba med mtha' chad mtha' gnyis// snying po rig pa'i ye shes don ma mthong// phra ba'i phra ba dngos med bag chags yin// de gsum dri mas chos sku bsgribs// de gsum bral na dri med rnam dag chos sku yin// da lta ngo sprad nam mkha'i snying po dang// ye shes snying po dbyer med chos sku ste// cer gyis bltas mthong bar na chos sku gnas// ye shes go na chos kyi sku// de nyid stong pa don gyi snang ba la// gdul bya la snang 'byung zhing 'gyur bas rig pa yin// ngo bo dngos po mi gnas ji bzhin mkhyen gsal ye shes sku// de nyid 'gyur med don gyis mi bskyed pa// gdul bya'i ngo la snang bzhin gyur pa rig pa yin// shes rab ngo la kha mig rna ba can du ma grub kyang// shes rab gsal chas dngos med dngos ltar mkhyen// shes rab ma bcos ting 'dzin lus kyi mchog tu gsungs// de nyid yon tan 'byung ba'i rin chen 'byung ldan yin// rtags dang chu 'dzin 'byung ba bzhir grub ma 'gags rig pa yin// de ltar gsal bas shes rab sku// dri mas ma gos don gyi snang mtha' yas// de ltar ma 'gags rig pa yin// snang ba mtha' yas dngos su ma grub par// dngos ltar snang zhing gsal ba shes rab sku// de nyid thogs pa med pas don grub yin// sgyu ma'i sku ru ma 'gags rig pa la// dngos med dngos ltar mkhyen pas shes rab sku// da lta ngo sprod snying gi dkyil na gnas// shes rab rig pas blo yi ngang nas gcod// yid dang 'grogs pas snod bcud zag bcas yin// chos sku'i mtshan ma ma 'gags rig pa la// sku lnga wa le gsal ba shes rab sku// shes rab ngo la de las med bzhin du// gdul bya rang snang rnam dag sku snang ste// ye shes gdangs las yon tan sku lngar brgyan// me long chu zla 'ja' tshon ji bzhin te// ye shes lus can sgyu ma tsam du ni// da lta ngo sprad ye shes sgron ma ste// sku yi rnam pa thugs kyi klong na gsal// rten dang bral bas bsgrib med zang thal dang// de nyid ye shes lnga ste gong bstan bzhin// mi mngon mi snang gsal byed min// mi 'gyur kun 'gro khyab pa po// rdo rje'i gdan ni ma lus ldan// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang// rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// nges 'byung kun gyi mtha' la gnas// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// ye shes mig gcig dri ma med// 'od bzang 'bar ba dpal gyi be'u// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku 'chang ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor can// rin

chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don te 'jigs pa med// grub pa mthar phyin 'khrul pa med// nor ba thams cad rnam par spangs// bdag med seng ge'i sgra dang ldan// mu stegs ri dwags ngan 'jigs byed// mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sgyu 'phrul drwa ba khyod la 'dud// ye shes sku nyid khyod la 'dud// ces gsungs so// 'jam dpa' dgongs pa 'dus pa las/ 'jam dpal thugs kyi le'u zab mo bstan pa ste drug pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa legs par zung// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang gsum// dgongs pa ma nor de bzhin no// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yang// yul med 'byung bar mi 'gyur te// spyir na zhing khams gsum na yang// sku gsum rgyal ba'i zhing khams yin// chos sku'i zhing khams rnam dag stug po bkod pa'i sa// longs sku'i zhing khams mtshan rdzogs rdo rje 'chang gi sa// sprul sku'i zhing khams khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu// gdul bya gsum yang de bzhin te// nyid las mi gzhan sku lnga dang/ sems dpa' sems ma'i sa pa dang// rigs drug du ma snang ba'o// de dag la yang gnyis yin te// sprul pa'i sku dang rang rgyud dang// rang rgyud 'khrul zhing 'khor ba ste// yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// brten nas 'khor lo bcu gnyis 'chang// snang ba chen po gsal ba ste// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// sems can kun gyi y-id ltar mgyogs// sna tshogs gzugs can yid las skyes// gzugs rnams sna tshogs kun tu ston// de ltar 'khrul snang shar ba'o// de ni sprul sku'i zhing yin te// chos sku'i zhing khams thugs gyi le'u bzhin// longs sku'i zhing khams sku yi le'u bzhin// thugs rje dag pa'i byung tshul yang// sku yi 'od dang gsung zer las// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// sku gsum dri med thugs rje 'byung// chos sku'i gnas lugs gong bstan bzhin// thugs rje rgyal ba rig pa ste// gong bshad bzhin du shes par gyis// longs sku thugs rje sprul pa ste// longs spyod rdzogs sku sku yi rgyal// mngon shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra/ sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don bgyid pa// lha yi dbang po lha yi lha// lha yi dbang po lha min bdag/ 'chi med dbang po lha yi bla ma// 'joms byed 'joms

byed dbang phyug po// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// ston pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang// 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa// chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po//
