byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste// snying rje yi ni ya lad bgos// sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas// shes rab chen pos skad cig la// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang// chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// rdo rje blo gros don chen byed// kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang// 'gro kun dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngo sel// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// rdo rje ral gris ma lus gcod// chos kyi gaN+Di sgra bo che// phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen ldan// chos kyi rgyal mtshan legs par 'dzugs// 'gro na gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// sman pa che mchog gtso bo ste// zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// nad do cog gi dgra che ba// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing// 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes sgron// snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes kun gyi don spangs shing// sems can kun yid yul dang ldan// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la gnas// sems can kun gyi yid la gnas// de dag sems dang mthun par 'jug/ sems can kun yid tshim par byed// mya ngan 'das zhi mya ngan 'das// legs par mya ngan 'das dang nye// bde sdug sel ba mthar gyur pa// chags bral lus las 'das pa po// lus can kun las rnam par grol// zhes gsungs so// de nas lag na rdo rjes sna drangs nas// bskor ba lan gsum byas nas su// dga' zhing mgu nas thal mo sbyar// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// lag na rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal// sna tshogs gzhan dang lhan cig tu// gsang bstod nas ni tshig 'di gsol// mgon po bdag cag yi rang ngo// legs so legs so legs par gsung// de yi nges don zab mo'i don// rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// 'gro ba mgon med rnams dang ni// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi/ byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro ba'i mgon po rjes yi rang// zhes gsol to// theg pa kun gyi yang rtse/ gsung rab ma lus pa'i nying khu/ 'jam dpal dgongs pa 'dus pa zhes bya ba/ gter gyi snying po rdzogs so//// gter chen gsum gyi srung mas mel tshe gyis shig/ dam med lag tu shor na chad pa

chod/ sku gsum gyi snang ba ngo sprod bzhi'i rgyud 'dir 'jug// rgya gar skad du/ sh+ma sha na skan+d+ha dz+wa lo pa de sha tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dur khrod phung po 'bar ba man ngag g-i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ dur khrod chen po'i rdzong/ keng rus kyi ri rab/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang/ gsang ba'i sgo bzhi btod pa na/ nyi zla zung cig gsal ba na/ bcom ldan 'das brjid pa'i khro gnyer can/ rang rig pa'i rgyal po ye shes chen po bzhugs te/ nang gi 'khor chen mkha' 'gro lnga/ phyi'i 'khor dag khye'u lnga/ gsang ba'i 'khor ni lha mo lnga dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan gtum khro 'bar// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan steng nas// rgya mtsho'i nang nas sku bzhengs nas// chos nyid klong nas gdangs bskyod la// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// phung po 'bar ba'i gsang rgyud 'di// thugs kyi klong nas rab bkrol la// mgur gyi bum par chos nyid dril// ljags kyi pad+mo dag la bkram// shangs kyi rlung sgrom dung gi tshems par dag nas ston mdzod la// yon tan sgo lnga khye'u lnga la brda sprad nas// mos pa'i 'khor la gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das brjid pa'i khro gnyer can gyis zhu ba'i 'khor gsang ba'i bdag po dang/ sdud pa'i 'khor dga' rab rdo rje/ mos pa'i 'khor mkha' 'gro lnga la sogs te bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams la/ dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i gsang rgyud 'di/ nga yis bshad kyis yid la zung// zhes bka' stsal to// sngon dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i ri rab na// dpag bsam gyi ljon shing lcang lo can gyi pho brang na// rlung nag mun ltar gtib pa'i nang shed na// 'dod chags chu ltar 'khrugs pa'i dkyil shed na/ khye'u shel gyi sgron me thogs// res 'ga' ri rab rtse la gnas// res 'ga' dur khrod 'dam du rgyu// res 'ga' 'khor ba'i chu bos khyer// res 'ga' rlung nag 'tshubs mas khyer/ khyer yang kho la shi ba med// yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// de yi don rnams gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas gsungs pa// brda yi don rnams ma go na// ngas bshad yid la nges par zung// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba ni// da lta'i dus na me ri 'bar ba ste// phyis kyi dus na gzugs kyi phung po'o// dpag bsam ljon shing bstan pa ni// srog tu gyur pa'i rlung bzhin te// lcang lo'i pho brang bstan pa ni// phyi ltar bstan na

'og min gnas// nang ltar bstan na thod pa ste// 'dod chags chu ltar brub pa ni// nyon mongs 'dod chags chen po ste// rlung nag mun ltar gtibs pa ni// phrag dog gti mug bdud kyis khyer// khye'u sgron me thogs pa ni// rig pa'i rgyal po rang snang ste// ri rab rtse la gnas pa ni// rgya mtsho'i mdangs la gnas pa yin// dur khrod 'dam du rgyu zhes pa ni// tsit+ta'i nang du rgyu ba yin// 'khor ba'i chu bos khyer ba ni// rnam rtog chu bos khyer ba yin// rlung nag 'tshubs mas khyer ba ni// dug lnga'i dbang du gyur pa yin/ kho la shi ba med ces pa ni// rig pa rdo rje lta bu'i sku// cir yang shar yang kho yi sku// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ 'dus pa brda'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang// phung po 'bar ba'i don rnams gsung du gsol// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngas bstan 'khor rnams yid la zung// phung po zhes su bstan pa ni// du ma 'dus pas phung po'o// 'jig pa'i phyir na phung po'o// rten pa'i phyir na phung po'o// 'dus pa'i phyir na phung po'o// phung po dag la brten pa ni// klad pa dung khang gzhal yas ni// he ru ka yi bzhugs gnas yin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i sgo bzhi ni// rig pa 'gyu ba'i gsang bzhi yin// b+h+r-i gu tsak+Shu'i sgo yis ni// rig pa'i ngo bo gdangs gsal bstan// mngon du 'gyur ba'i ye shes yin// 'byed pa med de zang thal lo// de yi ngang las ma g.yos na// dgongs pa zin pa'i tshad yin no// sal le sang nge rtog med gsal// dug lnga skye yang 'phel 'grib med// dper na nyi ma'i snying po bzhin// dus gsum rgyun gyi mun pa sel// thugs rje 'byung ba'i sgo yis ni// sgron ma rig pa'i rtsa ru 'gyus// lus kyi bcud dang thig ler bcas// sgal tshig gsang ba'i rta brgyud nas// rdo rje'i lam du bde bar thon// yum gyi pad+ma'i rdzing bur 'khyil// zla dgu ngo dang bcu ru gnas// ngo bo nyid kyi dge slong de// chos nyid rang sgra a haM zlos// sprul pa'i sku ru rab tu smin// thugs rjes gzigs snang don dam bcad// chos nyid shes rab sgo yis ni// shes rab dpyod pa'i rig pa ste// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so// shes rab skyes pa'i rlung zhes bya// chos rnams kun gyi thog mtha' bcad// skye med ngang du bsgom par shes// sgo bzhi mtha' yi slob dpon ni// skye med nam mkha' sgo yin te// thos bya ma 'gags sna tshogs ldan// sgo gsum 'dan la sgo gnyis phye// sgo gsum chod la sgo gcig sdom// spyir na sgo rnams ma bcad kyang// chos nyid sgo la yengs pa med// chu bo gzhung chen dgongs pa yin// dus gsum rgyun gyis rtog pas te// rgyal pos sa 'dzin blon

pos byas// rig pa 'byed med rang gsal ni// rgyal po blon po dmangs kyi tshul// rgyal po rig pa'i ngo bo nyid// mi 'gyur ma bcos rang bzhin gnas// ma bcos ji bzhin lhun grub gnas// stong pa chen po rdo rje'i sku// snying po rang gsal 'dzin med de// chos nyid rang gi gdangs la bzhugs// 'du 'dzis g.yengs kyang g.yos pa med// rA dza zhes ni de la bya// blon po sems kyi ngo bo ste// phyi blon nang blon gzung 'dzin gcod// rnam rtog sna tshogs yul las skye// dran pa phyogs med zhen par gcod// gzung 'dzin rgyud la rab tu bsags// rnam rtog phyin ci log la spyod// dug lnga ngar 'dzin khong du bcas// byan mo mdzangs ma'i mdzod bzhin du// dge sdig rtog pa sna tshogs bsags// ma rtogs blon pos dbang bsgyur te// ngan song gsum du the tshom med// rtogs na chos nyid rang rtsal te// shar yang rig pa'i ngang las shar// skye yang rig pa'i ngang las skye// grol yang rig pa'i ngang du grol// sna tshogs shar yang rig pa'i rtsal// dper na nam mkha'i klong nyid nas// sprin dang na bun khu rlangs shar// shar yang nam mkha'i klong du thim// de bzhin rig pa'i rgyal po la// blon pos las rnams rtsal du 'gyur// rig pa'i rtsal du shes tsam na// rgyan dang rol pa thugs rje'o// rig pa'i ngang nas ma g.yos na// stong gsum 'jig rten bsgral gyur kyang// ston pa'i thugs rjes bsgral ba las// sdig ces bya ba'i ming yang med// rtog pa gdeng du ma gyur na// skad cig sems kyi 'khu 'phrigs kyang// ngan song gsum po dag dang 'dra// des na rA dzas sa zin na// blon pos las rnams ci spyad kyang// rA dza'i ngang las g.yos pa med// rtogs pa rab kyi mtshan nyid do// dbang po 'bring gi mtshan nyid ni// rA dzas gdan sa ma zin na// blon po'i dbang du rA dza byas// blon po btson du bzung ba dang// rA dza gdan sa zin te mi bskyod do// rA dza gdan sa zin pa'i mtshan nyid ni// rgya mtsho ar la gtad de mi bsgul har por bzhag/ shes rab gser yi thur mas rig pa rang dbang bskur// des ni mnyam bzhag ma yin rjes thob bo// nyams su blang ba'i tshad yin no// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ phung po bshigs nas rigs pa ngos bzung ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// phung po'i nang du rgyal blon dngos bstan te// dmangs dang grol lugs ji ltar lags// mnyam pa'i ngang nas gsung du gsol// yang gsungs pa/ ngas bstan 'khor rnams nges zung zhig/ rig pa mi 'gyur rgyal po bzhin// blon pos sna tshogs gzung 'dzin byed// dmangs kyis gzhan snang yul la spyod// gsog pa'i dmangs dang

mchod pa'i dmangs// ma rtogs pa yi dus nyid na// sgo lnga'i rnam shes rnam pa lnga// sna tshogs rkyen gyis yul la spyod// sdug mi sdug gi yul gsum skye// sna tshogs spyad kyin yul la 'phyo// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rgyun du bsags// sgrib pa gnyis kyis yun du bsgribs// ma rig bdag tu nges par gzung// rgyud drug dag tu rtag tu 'khor// ma rtogs dus na de ltar snang// gsog pa'i dmangs te yul la spyad// yid kyi rnam shes bdag tu bzung// rgyal po mun pa'i nang na 'khyams// yang gsungs pa/ mchod pa'i dmangs ni 'di lta ste// sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa ste// byang chub sems kyi khye'u lnga// mig ni sa yi snying po ste// snang ba'i yul la shes pa shar// mthong ba'i gzugs ni sna tshogs spyad// rig pa'i ngo bo 'dzin med de// 'dzin med ngang las rtsal du shar// snang ba rnams la rgya yis btab// mi 'gyur ngang du rang sar grol// shar ba'i dus na thugs rje'i rgyan// grol ba'i dus na rgyal po mnyes// sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// rna ba phyag na rdo rje ste// thos bya ma 'gags yul la spyad// sgra yis rol mo'i mchod pa ste// rig pa skye med ngang du thim// rig pa rang gsal brda yin te// gdangs ni rang gsal dag tu thim// skye med chen po'i mchod pa'o// sna ni nam mkha'i snying po ste// bsgom bya'i rig pa'i rtsal yin te// snang ba'i dri ma rang bzhin gsal// dri nyid rig pa'i gdangs yin te// dri yi rang bzhin dngos po med// shar yang rig pa'i ngang las shar// thim yang rig pa'i ngang du thim// mnyam nyid thugs kyi klong du thim// lce ni khye'u spyan ras gzigs// ro mchog rig pa'i ngang nas gsal// sna tshogs ro yi mchod pa ste// ro ni gnyis med rig par thim// rig pa chos kyi sku nyid la// gzugs ni sku yi mchod pa yin// bde chen thugs kyi mchod pa yin// dri ni gsung gi mchod pa yin// ro ni yon tan mchod pa'o// lus ni sgrib pa rnam sel te// reg bya sna tshogs yul la spyad// bde ba chen por nyams myong ste// bde chen gnyis med ngang du thim// reg ni phrin las mchod pa'o// rig pa rang grol shes tsam na// rig pa'i rgyal po rang dbang thob// rig pa gnyis med chos sku la// mchod dang mi mchod mi mnga' ste// rtogs pa bde chen rnyed tsam na// don gyi ngo la mchod mi mnga'// mtshon pa'i ngo nas btags pa tsam// cir snang ci srid rig pa'i rtsal// rgyal po'i ngang las ma rtogs pa// blon po dmangs ni yod mi srid// ming du btags kyang rig pa'i rtsal// rol pa mdzad spyod thugs rje 'char// de ltar rtogs na dgongs pa'i mchog/ ces gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dmangs kyi bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// yang zhus pa/ kye kye brjid

pa'i khro gnyer can// phung po'i nang nas ji ltar 'byed// rtsa yi lam ni ji lta bu// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ ngas bstan 'khor rnams nges zung zhig/ phung po'i nang du dbye ba ni// rgya mtsho nyi ma can na rig pa nyid// rig pa'i snying po til 'bru'i cha dang mtshungs// de yi rang lus mtshon pa spu ris tsam// de yi rang gdangs nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// rig pa dngos med nam mkha' nyid la gsal// snang med mkha' la 'ja' tshon te// dus gsum 'gyur med ye nas gnas// gtang bzhag med par klod la bzhag/ chos kyi sku zhes bya'o// rig pa chos sku'i dbye ba ni// chos nyid snang ba'i sgo nas ni// shes rab 'gag med gsal dus su// shes rab longs spyod sku yin te// thogs med cir yang mkhyen par spyod// des mtshon shes rab sku lnga ste// mi 'gyur rdo rje lta bu'i sku// de nyid yon tan 'gag med las// rin 'byung chen po'i sku ru shar// de nyid skyon gyis ma gos te// ma chags snang ba mi 'gag ste// pad+ma'i rigs chen sku ru gsal// de nyid thogs med mtha' bzhi grol// sna tshogs rig pa'i ngang du grub// don grub chen por rang snang ngo// de nyid thogs med kun tu snang// kun gyi gzhi mor rnam snang gsal// rnam snang chen po de nyid do// dngos su mi snang mkhyen pa mi 'gag ste// don gyi ngo la dbyer med kyang// mtshon pa'i sgo nas sna tshogs snang// thugs mchog rig pa'i ngang nas dbye// rig pa gnyis med chos sku la// sprul sku tsam du shar ba ni// lam gyi sgron me'i thig le ste// dngos med dngos gsal 'dzin med de// drug ni thub pa zhes su bstan// de ni rig pa'i rang lugs so// de shes nas ni rang sa zin// sprul sku dag gi dbye ba'o// chos sku'i ngo bo 'gag med la// longs sku shes rab 'gag med spyod// sprul sku gdul bya'i yul snang ba// mtshon pa'i dpe ni nyi ma'i snying po bzhin// nyi ma'i snying po chos sku'i dpe// de las 'od zer sna tshogs shar// des ni 'gro drug mun pa sel// de bzhin chos sku rtog med gsal// longs sku shes rab 'gag med spyod// sprul sku thugs rjes nyon mongs sgrol// de gsum mtha' dag gcig gi ngang// chos sku'i bzhugs gnas rgyang zhags te// longs sku'i bzhugs gnas tsit+ta yin// sprul sku'i bzhugs gnas sgo lnga'o// phung po'i nang du de ltar dbye// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ rtsa yi lam zhes bstan pa ni// rgyang zhags dag nas rtsa shar ba// chos nyid rang byung rtsa zhes bya// nam mkha'i mthong khung sgo nas rtsa shar ba// gsang ba 'gag med rtsa zhes bya// rtsa gnyis chad pa yin nam/ de bzhi tsit+ta dag la zug/ tshad med sgo bzhi'i rtsa zhes so// tsit+ta rin chen gur phub nas// gzung 'dzin

rtog pa'i rtsa zhes te// rtsod pa'i sgo gsum dag tu zug/ de la ming du mtshon pa na// shes rab myur byed mi bo che// rnam shes rlung gi rta la zhon// gzung 'dzin lcags kyu lag na thogs// rtsod pa'i sgo gsum dag tu phyin// snang ba'i yul la gzung 'dzin spyad// rnam shes tshim byed ces su bya// rig pa'i rtsal ni gzhi ru 'dzin// snying rje med pa bskal pa'i rlung zhes bya// de dang bdud langs rtsa ru 'brel// rtsa de 'dus na 'chi rtags so// srog tu 'dzin pa'i rtsa dag gnas// mdud pa dar shog rtsa zhes bya// de dang bdud langs rtsa ru 'brel// sdud byed rlung chen brtags pa'o// nag po sdig med rtsa de nas// dpag bsam ljon shing rtsa zhes te// de ni bshad pa rang byung rtsa ru rtag/ des ni lus kyi dbang po bzung// thugs rje 'byung ba'i dus nyid na// rtsa ni mdud pa'i ltag sgo zhes// rtsa chen de rnams dag tu ni/ khrag dang chu ser mi rgyu ste// rig pa'i rtsal ni rlung du rgyu// ngo bo 'gag med gsal ba la// rtsa ni de rnams dag tu rgyu// rtsa las thugs rje sprul sku 'byin// la las shes rab chen por 'char// la las mi bskyod gzhi ru 'dzin// la las dus zad 'chi rtags ston// phung po'i nad du de ltar dbye// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rig pa'i gnas lugs dang/ rtsa'i dbye ba bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas yang zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// sems su dbye ba ji ltar dbye// ye shes zhes ni gang la bgyi// zhes zhus so// bka' stsal pa/ ngas bstan yid la nges zung zhig/ ngo bo dpe dang rnam grangs dang// gnas dang lam dang sgo dang ni// skyon dang yon tan 'bras bu'o// phyed tshad dbye ba'i dus bstan pa'o// sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// rlung can dag tu rtsal 'gyus te// dbugs ni brnyan ma dag dang 'dres// rig pa rkyen dang phrad pa yis// gzung 'dzin rtog pa cher song ngo// de la sems zhes bya ba ni// dbye ba rnam pa gsum yin te// don la sems pa sna tshogs pa// gsog pa'i phyir yang sems zhes bya// ngo bo dbugs ni brnyan mas te// ye nas med de 'phral la byung// dper na tshong dus 'o ma bzhin// je lad je lad song ba'o// grangs ni rnam pa brgyad du bstan// gnas ni rlung can grong na gnas// lam ni mgrin pa dag tu rgyu// sgo ni 'dod pa'i sgo gsum shar// skyon ni rtog pa sna tshogs byed// 'bras bu bag chags phung po len// phyed pa'i tshad ni rgyu srang tshad// dbye ba'i dus ni phung po bor// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ ye shes zhes bya bstan pa ni// dbye ba rnam grangs nges tshig dang// ngo bo gnas dang lam dang sgo// las dang yon tan 'bras bu dang// byed tshad dbye ba'i dus bstan no// dbye ba

rnam pa lnga yin no// rnam grangs dag ni brgyad du bstan// nges tshig ye nas shes pas ye shes so// glo bur min pas ye shes so// ye nas yod pa'i rig pa de// bla ma dam pas mtshon nas ni// rang rig rtogs pas shes tsam na// ye shes zhes ni de la bya// ngo bo lam gyi sgron ma de// ma bu rnams la rang chas gnas// lam ni chos nyid rtsa ru brgyud// sgo ni b+h+r-i gu ta ru shar// las ni shes rab thogs med spyod// yon tan gzung 'dzin rtog pa med// 'bras bu sku gsum rang la rdzogs// phyed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni// rgyu srang gcad la kha la gdon// rang gsal 'dzin med ngang la bzhag/ dbye dus phung po bor ba'o// gzung 'dzin nam mkha'i mtha' la dngas// phung po sa dang rdo dang 'dra// ye shes zhing khams rnam par dag/ sgrog ni gsum sbrel gyes pa bzhin// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sems dang ye shes dbye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// sbubs gsum rgyud la ci 'dra mchi// sku gsum 'du 'bral yod dam med// ces zhus so// yang gsungs pa/ ngas bstan yid la nges par zung// rat+na 'gyur med sbubs bstan pa// chos nyid rang sgor gsal ba la// rig pa rang gdangs 'gyur med shar// chos su ngo bo 'gag med la// rang bzhin 'od kyi snang ba shar// dang po srid pa zhi nas ni// tha ma phung po ma bor bar dag tu// chos nyid rang sgo'i ngang na gnas// thog ma'i lhun grub sangs rgyas te// da lta gsal ba'i sgron mar gnas/ yon tan 'byung ba'i rin po che// sku gsum ye shes lnga ru shar// 'gyur ba med pas rdo rje ste// rig pa gnas pas sbubs zhes bya// phung po dag la mtshon gyur na// chos nyid rang byung sgo yin no// ye shes sgyu ma'i sbubs zhes ni// byang chub lam gyi sgron ma ste// rtogs kyi ye shes nyid la bzung// chos nyid bar do zhes kyang bya/ rig pa rang lus 'od du gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rang lus te// brtags na med la bzhag na 'byung bas legs pa che// tshon gang 'od kyis kun tu khyab// ye shes snang ba zhes bya ste// sgyu ma sbubs kyi ngos bzung ngo// rnam rtog bag chags sbubs zhes ni// gzugs kyi phung po nyid yin te// de ma rdzogs na rtsal mi rdzogs// rtsal ma rdzogs na sgo mi rgyas// sgo ma rgyas na mtha' mi chod/ mtha' ma chod na don mi rtogs// lus ngag rdzogs na dgongs sangs rgyas// rtsal rdzogs chos rnams kun gyi rtogs mtha' chod// yang dag mtha' las rnam par grol// dus gsum 'gyur med dgongs pa chod// rtogs pa rgyud la rab tu smin// lta ba'i thag ni yongs su bcad// bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa phul du dbyung// chu

bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor te// dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par gnas/ khyung chen gnam 'phang gcod pa la// nyam nga bag tsha ka nas dag/ ces gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ sku gsum 'du 'bral med pas te// gang zag rgyud la mtshon pas te// dbang pos mthong ba ma 'gags pa// shes bya ye shes med pas te// rig pa chos kyi sku zhes bya// mthong ba nges par mkhyen pas te// shes rab rang grol thogs med 'char// gsal la rtog med ngang du shes// mkhyen pa longs sku zhes su bya// mig gi de nyid kho na ste// rnam shes ma yin 'od lngar gsal// snang la rang bzhin med pas te// drug ni thub pa kho nas te// sprul pa'i sku zhes de la bya// ngo bo rang bzhin thugs rje ste// dper na rma bya'i sgo nga bzhin// dbyibs su grub pa chos sku ste// chos nyid 'od lngar shar ba na// longs sku mtshon pa'i dpe ru bstan// rma bya'i phru gur byung ba'i tshe// sprul pa sku yi dpe ru bstan// de gsum 'du 'bral yod dam med// 'du 'bral med de gcig gi ngang// de gsum sku gsum ye shes lnga// sna tshogs bgrangs kyang tha dad med// mtshon bya'i yul du bgrangs pa tsam// don ni dngos med gcig las med// ces gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsum sbubs gsum rgyud la brtse ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa// kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// gang zag gzugs kyi phung po la// grong khyer gsum po ji ltar brtse// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// brjid pa'i khro gnyer gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba'i grong khyer sdug bsngal mtsho// phung por ro smad dag yin te// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags sdug bsngal rgyu// mi gtsang pa la longs spyod nas// nyon mongs dug lnga sna tshogs bskyed// don ni dngos med ma rtogs par// log srid 'dod pa sna tshogs spyad// chos sku gnyis med don rtogs na// thugs rje bde ba'i rang bzhin bskyed// rgyu nyid rdo rje dbyings nyid de// 'bras bu ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs// zhes gsungs so// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer ni// mngon par dga' ba'i zhing khams te// mkhyen pa longs sku'i gnas yin no// shes rab 'byed med rang sar shar// thugs rje ma 'dres so sor mkhyen// shes rab srog tu gyur pa ste// rlung lnga las ni tha dad med// rlung chen mi bskyod bzhi ru gnas// zhes gsungs so// srid pa'i grong khyer rje blon bya ra'i sa// rje ni rig pa chos sku la// blon po 'gyur med sems zhes bya// rgyal po mi 'gyur chos sku ste// sa 'dzin blon po zhes su grags// grong khyer gsum brtsegs man ngag

ni// gzugs kyi phung po nyid la'o// de gsum rig pa'i bzhugs gnas yin// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ gang zag gi rgyud la grong khyer gsum brtsegs bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer ldan// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// nyams su blangs lugs gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// ston pas bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nges zung zhig/ nyams su blang lugs bstan pa ni// yang rab nyams su blang lugs ni// spyod lam rnam bzhi gar spyod kyang// lta ba'i ngang las g.yos pa med// rgyun chad med pa'i dgongs pa'o// rkang med mkha' la 'gro ba ni// lta ba 'gyur med rgyab shar bshad// grogs med gcig pur gnas pa ni// dgongs pa nyag gcig rgyab shar bshad// 'gro nyal spyi tshugs ci byed kyang// snying po'i don las g.yos pa med/ de ltar snying po'i don rtogs na/ ma rig pa nyid rtsad nas bcad// rang rig dang po'i so la bzhag/ shes bya'i sgrib pa ka nas dag/ 'khrul pa'i snang ba rgya yis btab// sku gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang na gnas// zhes gsungs so// yang gsungs pa/ dbang po 'bring gi nyams blangs ni// blon po btson du zin pas rgyal pos gdan sa zin// ma yengs mnyam par bzhag pas byang chub skye// shes pa chu yi rgyun dang 'dra// brtags kyin brtags kyin rang dbang thob// shes rab chen po'i rang dbang thob// spros med dbyings nas rang byung gsal// lhun grub yongs su rdzogs zhes bya// de ltar dgongs pa'i don shes na// nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes te// rig pa rgyun gyi rtogs pa'o// glang chen chur zhugs dgongs pa ste// nyam nga bag tsha'i shes pa med// ces gsungs so// dbang po tha ma'i nyams blang ni// sems gzung rig pa ar la gtad// bying ba mi gseng rang sar bsgom// de ltar bsgoms na rig pa zin// bar dor rtogs pa gdod skye'o// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dbang po rab 'bring tha ma gsum gyis nyams su blang lugs bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag pos zhus pa/ kye kye bcom ldan khro gnyer can// phung po'i don la ji ltar sbyang// dur khrod ces ni gang la bgyi// mthong snang rim gyis ji ltar 'char// rig pa'i rgyal pos gsung du gsol// zhes zhus so// yang gsungs pa/ phung po'i don ni 'di bzhin te/ da lta'i bag chags rnam rtog la// rtogs pa'i ye shes ma skyes pas// ma rig rang gar gzung 'dzin spyad// nyon mongs dug lnga'i dbang du gyur// rig pa'i ye shes phung zhes bya// po ni rang sa ma zin 'jig

pa'o// 'bar ni nyon mongs dug lnga 'bar// brgyud ni 'khor ba rang gar brgyud// dur khrod mi gtsang nang na gnas// ma rig ma rtogs dus na'o// skyon gyi mthar gsum sel gyur na// ma rig sems kyi gdar sha bcad// dug lnga rang grol ye shes te// de ltar rig pa'i don shes na// rig pa ma yin gzhan snang med// skye med chen po'i ngang du gol// thams cad mngon sangs nyid du rgyas// de ltar thams cad rgyas thebs na// phung ni ma rig dug lnga phung// po ni rig pa 'gyur ba med// 'bar ni bde chen rtogs pa 'bar// dur ni chos kyi dbyings yin te/ khrod ni rig pa'i ye shes nyid// rang gis rang snang zin pa'o// chos nyid zhing khams dag gsal la// rig pa'i ye shes rang gsal thim// dbyings dang ye shes rig pa gnyis med de// rang sa zin te mi 'gyur ba'o// zhes gsungs so// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ phung po rgyud la sbyar zhing snang ba go bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po dang// sdud pa'i 'khor dga' rab rdo rje dang/ 'khor mkha' 'gro ma lnga ste/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma/ las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/ gtsug gi rgyan gcig ma/ rdo rje khro gdong ma la sogs te mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' khye'u lnga dang/ gsang ba'i 'khor dug lnga dbang du sdud pa'i ye shes lnga dang/ nye ba'i 'khor sprul pa'i sras bdun la sogs te/ gsang ba'i bdag pos sna drangs te/ skor ba lan gsum byas nas/ e ma ho/ bdag cag 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams la// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i gsang rgyud de// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgo phye nas// shes rab rlung gi lha mos bskyod// 'gyur med gsung gi bum par dril// ljags kyi pad+ma dag la bkram// tshems dkar bzhi bcu'i nang nas bton// phung po 'bar ba'i gsang rgyud 'di// bdag cag 'dus pa'i 'khor la gnang// ma rig mun pa'i blo gsal nas// rang rig 'byed med ngang du bskyal// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon du 'gyur/ rang bzhin spros pa'i mtha' bcad nas// 'gyur med dgongs pa'i ngang du bskyal// zhes bstod do// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mjug rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// dur khrod phung po 'bar ba'i man ngag gi rgyud rdzogs so//// slob dpon bi ma las mnga' bdag la gdams pa/ gzhan la bstan par gyur na/ sgrol byed chen pos snying khrag 'jibs so////

rgya gar skad du/ badzra prA gra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// snying po rdo rje 'chang chen po// chos sku kun tu bzang po de// rang byung 'phrul gyi rdo rje'i sku// gnyis med mnyam par rang byung gnas// gnyis med snang ba rang byung 'khor// brjod gsung med pa rang byung chos// snga phyi med pa snying po'i dus// mi nub rgyal mtshan rdo rje'i sku ru gsal// phyi med nang med 'og min kun tu nang// snga phyi dus mnyam snying po sprul pa'i 'khor// zhing khams rang gsal rig cha kha dog gsal// gdul bya med pa'i chos rnams rang byung chos skur bzhugs// de nas kun byed rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje sems dpas rang byung 'phrul gyi me tog phul// sprul pa'i sprul pas rang byung du bskor te// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// 'khor bar 'khrul 'khor sems can la// thugs rje chen pos mi gzigs sam// nyid kyi sngon gyi thugs dam btsan// sems can sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// snying po ngos bzung cha rkyen las// nyid kyis rdzogs par bstan du gsol// de nas kun bzang rdo rje 'chang// rang byung 'phrul gyi skur bzhengs nas// sprul pa'i 'khor dang yang sprul 'khor// 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa// rang byung snying po byang chub sems// rgyal bar gyur pa'i snying po yin// stong pa'i chos nyid dam pa yin// snang ba ma 'gags lhun gyis grub// gnyis su med pa'i dam pa yin// 'khor ba'i bcud phyung bde gshegs rgyud// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// yon tan dang ni phrin las kyi// snying po gsum du bsdu ba dang// de yi cha rkyen bstan par bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ zhus pa dang lan gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// rang byung snying po gsum las byung// pha dang ma dang rang dang gsum// pha ni thabs chen kun tu bzang// ma ni shes rab kun bzang yum// bu ni gnyis med rang byung hUM// rdo rje 'chang ba nyid kyi sku// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog/ ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// snying po sku bzhir rang byung bsgrags// skye med 'phrul gyi rang byung sku// rin chen 'phrul gyi rang byung sku// rdo rje 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// rang byung hUM du lhun grub yin// sgom spyod rtogs pa bskyed rdzogs las// de nas kun grol dgongs pa'i mchog/ 'gyu dran 'dzin chags gdeng du gyis// 'gyu dran

'dzin chags goms byed na// rtsa rlung thig le gsal bar byed// pha rtsa ma rtsa rang rtsa gsum// thabs dang shes rab ye shes gsum// ro ma rkyang ma kun 'dar gsum// la la ra sa d+hU ti gsum// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le gsum// dkar dang dmar dang mthing dang gsum// hUM dang snying po rang byung rtsal// thams cad 'dus pa gcig med ston// a ti yo ga yul med khrol// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ rang byung sku'i mtshon pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// brjod pa kun gyi rgyu yi mchog/ hUM zhes ma bslabs rang byung skad// sangs rgyas gsung la sems can sku// ye nas rang byung 'phrul gyi sgra// gzhi nas 'bras bu lam gyi rgyu// ming gi snying po 'phrul gyi tshig/ ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung// zhes bka' stsal pas// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// snying po gang lags nye snying gang// yang snying gang lags bstan tu gsol// kun byed rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// 'bru lnga ma hA sku lnga'i sngags// rigs lnga phyogs dang dug lnga byung// lnga ldan don gyi snying po yin// 'bru gsum nye ba'i snying po yin// gsum sgrol a nu'i dgongs pa bstan// sku gsum dug gsum pha mar rang// gsum sgrol rig sngags gzungs sngags yin// 'bru gcig a ti yul med sgra// gcig med yul dang 'brel ba'i sngags// bla na med pa'i rang byung snying// yang snying 'phrul gyi snying po yin// 'byung lnga sku lnga phyogs lnga ye shes lnga// 'bru brgyad snying po dag tu bzla// hUM dang ru lu sbrel ba'i glu// srod dang tho rangs dus drug blangs// 'bru gsum srog rtsol gnas pas bzlas/ u nan dbang bskur spro bsdu a// gsang sngags gzungs sngags rig sngags bsdebs// sngags rnams gang yang mgo bo gnon// 'bru gcig yid la rang byung sngags// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags kun dang 'grogs// rgyu rtsa gzhi nyid 'dzin pa'i sngags// ma btags kun gyi rang sgra yin// phyi ltar brda ru mig la ston// nang ltar rtag tu lus la sbyor// gsang ba yid tshogs sgra ru sgrogs// don du chos nyid snying po hUM// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ gsung mtshon pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//// kun byed rgyal pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// rdo rje hUM ste hU~M zhes sgrogs// ngo bo stong pa blta ba yin// yul med phyogs lhung med pa yin// hUM du 'dzin pa ting 'dzin yin// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags yengs pa med// log lta gcod pas 'khor lo yin// rang byung ngos 'dzin 'khor lo gnyis// rang sems bsgrub pas dam rdzas yin// de

dang mi ldan dam rdzas yin// yid la skyob pas sngags kyang yin// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags so// dbugs kyi 'phro 'du bzla lugs yin// 'gro 'ong gnas pa hUM gi stobs// na ru son na phrin las yin// grub rtags mngon du 'di ka rang// sems la dbang thob mngag pa yin// 'gyus dran dbang thob dbang gi mchog/ hUM du dngos thon mngon rtags yin// sku dang gsung dang thugs sogs hUM// ma grub ting 'dzin spog pa yin// brtson 'grus brtson med yengs pa med// a la thim pas gzir ba yin// rang byung skye ba med par shes// dgongs par skyol na shi sa yin// gcig med gang yang yin pa'i hUM// ci yang yin no gang yang rung// su zhig thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rten dang ldan no khyad par che// rang byung skye med snying po yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las// thugs mtshon pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// nor bu rin chen 'od 'bar bshad// sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// dper na nor bu rin chen gling// sa rdo mi gnas rin po che// rang byung snying po sus rtogs pa// 'khrul snang dge sdig gang yang med// chos nyid chos dbyings snying po'i klong// gang ltar byas kyang snying po'i grogs// dper na me la shing bsnan 'dra// gang zhig rang byung ngo shes pa// zhi rgyas dbang drag phrin las 'grub// nang 'jil lus bde 'byung ba lnga// 'du bas mi tshugs rdo rje 'dra// srog snying rang byung ngo shes na// lha dang klu dang gza' dang bdud// gnod sbyin srin po dmu dang btsan// rgyal po ma mo lha srin kun// khrims la gnas kyi rgyal po 'dra// rang byung snying po sus 'chang ba// bsod nams longs spyod 'khor rdzas 'phel// dgra med sus mthong pha dang ma// nor bu rin chen 'chang ba 'dra// lo zla gza' skar dus tshod med// sprin med mkha' dkyil nyi ma 'dra// gang la snang sngags rang byung sngags// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i glog dang 'dra// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ thams cad yon tan du mtshon pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra satwa khyod// las rnams ldan par tshogs pa ni// snying po sgyu ma'i rdzas dang 'dra// gcig la mthong snang 'char lugs yang// dper na nor bu rin po che// 'chang bas yon tan 'byung ba 'dra// dpa' bo gcig pa rin po che// zhi dang rgyas pa drag po'i las// gang la bya ba de nyid snang// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// rnam smin 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i gdon// de yi yon tan mngon du snang// dper na nyi mas khyab pa 'dra// rnam smin sgrib pa'i nad dang gdon// snying po rtogs

pa'i gang zag la// de yi don rtags bstan pa ni// dper na rmi lam sad pa 'dra// goms rtags brtan par 'byung ba yin// sgrib pa sbyong ba drag zhan yin// dge sdig gnyis po mnyam nyid na// rnam par smin pa'i 'bun pa dengs// nam mkhar khu rlangs dengs pa 'dra// nad ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin 'gyur// lus kun thig le rgyas pa 'dra// gdon kun rgyal po zin pa yin// dmangs dang me lam rtsi sbur 'dra// snying po rang byung sus rtogs pa// rin chen gser gling phyin pa 'dra// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ phrin las mdor bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// ma bu gnyis kyi sbyor sgrol gyis// snying po chos kyi sku ru sgrol// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong// 'dren pa'i thugs rje rgyun mi chad// 'gyu dran chos kyi dbyings su sbyor// chags pa rang byung klong du grol// gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa yin// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags dbang du gyis// rig pa rtsal gyi dbang bskur yin// lha dang bum pa rig ma dang// gzhan la ltos 'gyur chos ma yin// rang byung ngos zin 'khrul pa med// 'gyu dran rang sbyang rang sgrol dbang// 'dzin chags do chad snying po'i yul// 'dzin med 'gyu ba rang byung dbang// bdag med yul grol ye shes dbang// dbang gi rgyal po rang byung dbang// sangs rgyas re med dbang mchog yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ dbang sbyor sgrol rtsa ba mtshon pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// ci yang yin ni gang yang rung// mdun dang rgyab dang phyogs bcu ru// gang ltar snang yang snying po nyid// snying po snang ba rang byung yin// ci yang med do gang yang snang// med btags 'khrul pa rdzun pa'i chos// ming tsam 'di zhes mtshon na ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon du med// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin yin// gcig po rang yang gang du 'dug/ ming med yul dang bral bar gyis// yul snang gzugs ni srog gi gzhi// yul du bden pa gang na 'dug/ rdul tsam 'dug na srog la shor// srog gi la shan phyed par gyis// ming btags chos kun snying po'i gzhi// ming yig sgra bsgrags gang la bden// gcig tsam bden na ming la 'khor// tshig gi sgro 'dogs chod par gyis// gnyis med gnyis su med par ston// bstan pas yul med mtshon tshig gang// bden par sus smra 'khrul pas chog/ dngos po dngos med gnyis ka gcig/ stong nyid smra ba'i khyu mchog yin// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// gang ltar snang ba snying po'i brda'// 'dren pa'i thugs rje 'gag pa med// ye shes sku ste rang byung yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang

rtse'i rgyud las/ lta ba la bzla ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas rdo rje 'chang kun tu bzang po nyid// mtshon pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// byed pa sems can kun don byed// phan 'dod sems can gnyes gshin pa// rang byung 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// ting 'dzin gsum gyi sgo nas bskyed// sku gsal gdul bya la dmigs la// mchod sbyin tshogs sogs rgyun du bya// tshogs gnyis tshogs ni bsag par bya// mchod rten sku gdung gdab par bya// rang byung snying po'i tsha tshwa dang// rgyu rkyen 'byung lnga'i tsha tshwa gdab// gtor ma phyi nang gnyis ka bya// chu gtor klu gtor dmar gtor dang// rdo rje tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// 'byor bshams dngos po bsam pa tshogs// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags za tshogs bya// gtsang ma khrus kyi las byed na// rin chen gang ldan bum pa der// srod dang tho rangs chu blangs la// snying pos byin brlab dag par bkru// me dang rlung dang sa dang bdud rtsi kun// khrus su rnal 'byor gang bde bya// bsrung ba gsang ba'i rdzas dang sngags// dpa' bo gcig pa'i las rim bya// mdze nad gdug pa'i las gso na// zhi drag gnyis kyi las la 'jug/ klu rigs nad rigs mchod gsad dgrol// nad kyi gnod lugs bcos ka bya// bsgrub la bar chod dgra byung na// lan gsum 'pham blang 'gyod med bya// de nas dkon mchog dpang btsugs la// rlung ldog pa yi dus su bsgral// rang gis ma nges rbod gtong na// snying po 'phrul gyi sku bsgom la// hUM la b+h+yo bzlog rbad btags na// skye ka sdom sdig ji bzhin 'gyur// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa'i nad 'don na// yi ge drug pa'i gnad kyis gdon// stod smad bar gyi gdon lugs yin// tsha grang spyod pa bsams pas sbyangs// 'khor lo lnga yi rtsa sgo la// drod gdon grang ba pho mo'i nad// bcud len zas ni grogs yin no// rnam smin las kyang sbyangs par nges// 'byung 'khrugs gdon la the mi tshom// bar chod gdon gyi nad byung sems 'khrugs na// gdon ngos bzung ba shin tu gces// srog snying gsal ba rab tu gces// gang yin de la gtad pa gces// lus nyams mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur// 'khor lo srog gnad snying pos gtems// rjes med mchod pa'i bye brag bya// byang chub chen po'i grogs su 'gyur// kho yi cho 'phrul nga ru khrol// nga ni cir snang cir 'dug ltos/ 'gyu dran 'dzin chags yul dang bral// ming med tshig gi rtog pa zad// rtogs shig rtogs shig skal ldan bu// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ las thams cad pa'i skabs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// rdo rje 'chang bas

bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// dus gsum bde gshegs gsang chen ni// 'bum las 'ga' yis rtogs par dka'// 'gyur med rang byung snying po 'di// gang du gyur kyang rang byung nyid// gcig ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sna tshogs 'chang// mi 'gyur ba yi snying po dang// sku gsung thugs dang rgyas pa lnga// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// ting 'dzin 'phro 'du rdzas dang gsum// sprul pa yin pas cir yang 'gyur// rang byung gdeng dang ldan par gyis// rang byung snying po srog dang ming// zung du gzhug pas rang gshed bya'o// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med do// dpa' bo gcig pa'i 'khor lo ni// yul med ming dang bral ba las// rang byung snying po gcig pur rtogs// gcig pu rang yang phyogs dang bral// gang yang yin no ci yang rung// rang byung snying po'i 'khor ba lo/ gdeng chen rtogs pa'i 'khor lo yin// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// sku srog 'khor lo yul la bskor// gsung ming 'khor lo tshig la bskor// thugs kyi 'khor lo rtogs pas bskor// gsum tshan sku gsung thugs shes bya// thabs dang shes rab ye shes gsum// de la yon tan nor bu 'dra// sna tshogs thugs rje las su mdzad// yon tan phrin las 'khor lo yin// re re la yang gsum gsum du// cha ldan phr-in las sgo nas bstan// 'jig rten dregs pa gzhom pa dang// 'byung ba 'khrugs pa gzhom pa'o// 'di ni phyag na rdo rje dang// khro bo la sogs gshin rje las// dpa' bo gcig pa rang byung thugs// rgyu dang snag tsha smyu gur ldan// thig bskor rim pa lnga ru bskor// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi brgyad cu drug/ sum cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// dpa' bo gcig pa sum bsgril bri// g.yas dang g.yon dang rang byung gzer// lha dang yig 'bru mtshon cha me// dug lnga 'byung ba skabs dang sbyar// bsam pa spro 'bar rdzas gsum bya// dpa' bo gcig pa'i 'khor lo yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// rdzas ni rgya shog ro ras dang// gro ga sa lnga las dang sbyar// bsam pa ting nge 'dzin gyi las// rin chen 'phrul gyi snying po bsgom// sems dpa' gsum ni gsal bar bya// ting 'dzin rnam gsum sems dpa'i mkhar// yi dam zhi khro dus dang sbyar// de nas spro bsdu dbugs la bskyon// ba spu la sogs kun nas spro// re re'i sgo nas grangs med spro// spro bsdu dbugs kyi 'khor lor 'dod// 'khor lo'i rnam pa grangs mang yang// g.yas bskor g.yon bskor cho lu gsum// steng gcod 'og gcod phyogs gcod gsum// dkrug dang bzlog dang rnal ma

dgu/ rkyang pa dang ni bcu ru bshad// 'khor lo bskor ba'i man ngag yin// pha bskor ma bskor rang bskor gsum// 'khor lo mdo yis bsdu bar bya// rang byung dmigs pa snying po'i klong// yul med ming dang bral tsa na// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags 'khor ba la// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo'i gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// sku gsum 'khor lo bstan pa ni// mi skye chos can a yi bskor// rdzas tshogs rgyu ni ldan pa la// thig skor rim pa lnga'am drug/ lte ba rtsibs bzhi brgyad bcu drug/ sum cu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi/ a ni skye med a sbyor bkod// shi sa bstan pa'i 'khor lor bshad// dbyangs yig drug cu brgyad pa la// bcu drug 'jam dpal yi dam sngags// bcu gnyis shi sa bstan pa dngos// drug pa 'khor lo lnga rdzogs nyid// skye med 'gag pa med pa'i chos// a ni chos kyi dbyings su gnas// sa ni chos nyid 'gyur ba med// ha ni 'gag med a ha chas// a ni skye med gnas su ldog/ skye 'byung med pa a ha ma// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ gsung gi 'khor lo'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// sku yi 'khor lo bstan pa ni// rdzas dang snag tsha tshogs pa la// thig le skor rim gong dang 'dra// lte ba rtsibs bzhi dpa' bo lnga// brgyad pa tshogs brgyad sems dpa' brgyad// gang bsgrub 'khor gyi lha tshogs so// bcu drug khro bcu thub pa drug/ sum cu gnyis la dbang mo mkha' 'gro bzhi// sku yi 'khor lo yin par 'dod// 'bru lnga gtso byas 'khor lo lnga// yon tan phrin las de bzhin shes// rin chen lta bur yon tan 'byung// sa tshon gang bsgrub yi dam sngags// 'khor lo gang 'dra de la dgod// yon tan 'khor lo yin par 'chad// thugs rje'i byin rlabs cir yang ston// gang brtsam las de 'grub par 'gyur// has mtshon gang bsgrub gsang ba'i gnas// phrin las 'khor lo yin par 'dod// thig bskor lnga ru rdzogs par bris// lte ba hUM la bzhi brgyad hUM// bcu drug ha la so gnyis hi// nad gdon thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dzin pa na// dam tshig can gyi slob bu la// thugs rje can gyi slob dpon gyis// dam bsre gnang ba sems bskyed bya// dad ldan bus kyang yid 'thad nor gyis bslu// bla ma mchod dang chos skyong bskang// sbyin pa dge ba tshogs gsog bya// sdig sbyangs chos ni chags pa'i rten// de ltar

tshul dang ldan par bya// bla ma thugs rje byams ldan des// brda dang ngag gis slob bu bsral// brda bstan yul du dmigs pa bstan// ngag brjod lce rtses rna bar dkrugs// shes rab can gyis bu la bstim// phyi ltar snying po brda ru ston// nang ltar lus dang rtsa rlung sprod// gsang bar yi ge snying po khrol// don du chos nyid snying por 'dus// lnga bskor gsum sgrom 'phrang du chug/ rang thog zangs kyi wa nas drongs// 'thor ba thams cad de la sdus// sku dang bum pa dkyil 'khor dang// dbyibs dang phyag mtshan sna tshogs gzugs// pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dang// rin chen rgya gram ral gri mda'// kha TAM phur pa zhing dbyug dang// gzhu dang dril bu zhags pa dang// lcags kyu zhags pa dgra s+t+wa dang// zlum po gru bzhi zla gam dang// gru gsum la sogs sna tshogs pa// kha dog la sogs de dang mtshungs// snang ba sna tshogs snying po nyid// snang ba yod med de la brtags// gcig po kun tu snang bas chog/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ snang ba snying por bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// kun byed rgyal po kun bzang gis// sems dpa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// srid pa lus kyi grub tshul ni// rang byung rgyu rkyen snying po 'di// rang byung rgyu ba sna tshol tshe// 'khrul pa'i lus rten 'od las len// 'gyu ba rgyu la dkar dmar rkyen// rgyu ba bar dor rkyen dang 'dzom// pho mo'i 'du 'phrod gzhal yas 'od// bar do de la snang log 'dzin// bdun phrag zla dgu ngo bcu ni// lus su rdzogs te ma las phrul// nang nas shes pa phyir mi gsal// zhag dang zla ba lo yis 'grib// gzung 'dzin shes pa je rags song// dug lnga chags ldang gzung 'dzin spyod// shes rab rtog dpyod dge sdig go/ de ltar snying po lus kyi rgyu// ha gnyis kha sprad lus kyi rgyu// byang khog stod du brda sprad gsal// 'a dang zhabs skyed ro smad rkang// gu gu thig le zla tshes mgo/ 'greng bu+u na ro rtsa dang skra// de ltar snying po nyid las grub// brda ru snying gi bu la ston// pha rtsa ma rtsa rang rtsa gsum// lus dang sems kyi gzhi ma yin// rgyu ba rlung gi rtsal rdzogs tshad// tha ma thig le rang gi sems// dang po rgyu las 'bras bu smin// pha rtsa shel gyi chu 'bab 'dra// tshad du smin pas smin dus yin// thod pa dbang mo sgal tshigs sbubs// rus pa'i rtsal rdzogs sen mo yin// rkang dang rkang mar klad gzhung nas// thig le nya mig bcud kyi mchog/ la la rtsa ste sgal tshigs sbubs// ro ma dkar mo thabs rtsa ba// bde ba gsal ba rags pa g.yas// ma rtsa btsod kyi thag pa 'dra// tshad du smin pa mdzod spu yin// don snying nang rol sha yi sbubs// dngas snyigs rlung rgyu rgyus mang bsgrags// rtsal

rdzogs pags pa ba spu skra// sha dang don snying rtsa las khrag/ thig le dmar po zla tshigs 'dzin// ra sa rkyang ma dmar ser srog pa rtsa// don snying 'khor lo lnga dang 'brel// 'gag med rlung bzung shes rab mchog/ stong pa ma rtsa rags pa g.yon// de nyid zung 'brel sgrog rus lpags// de ltar lus po 'byung ba lnga las grub// snying po hUM gi sgra 'di rtags// sems can kun gyi sgra ru hUM// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs su hUM// stong pa gsal ba 'gag med hUM// chos min snying po rang 'byung hUM// rang byung rtogs na grol bar 'gyur// mi 'gyur mthing ga rang gi rtsa// a wa d+hU tI kun 'dar ma// ye shes lnga rgyu tshon gyi sku// 'od lnga 'ja' tshon nyi zer 'dra// pha ma gnyis kyi par na rgyu// rdo rje pad+ma tshangs bug sgo// 'khor lo lnga dang 'brel ba'i rtsa// bzhi brgyad bcu drug sum cu gnyis// drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'o// nyi khri chig stong rgyas pa'i rtsa// byang sems thig le rgyu ba rlung// rdo rje hUM gi rtsal du bshad// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ snying po lus kyi grub tshul gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// kun byed kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// sangs rgyas gsung la sems can sgra// snying po sgra yi gdams pa 'di// snying po yin par gzhi ru bcas// gang snang ming du btags pa kun// snying po'i chos su bsgrub par bya// tshig tu yi ge ming du btags// btags sgra gang brjod snying po'i sgra// gzhi dang sgrub byed gzhan 'phrang bsdam// yi ge'i tshogs sogs grogs su 'gyur// ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ a A/ i I/ u U/ e A+ai/ o A+au/ ri r-I/ li l-I/ aM AH/ de dag snying po hUM gi grogs// sku gsum khyab byed rgya ma chad/ nga ni rang byung snying po'i chos// gcod byed cha ldan 'joms par byed// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das pa nya// gtan 'bebs thig le dus la babs// yod med gnyis la 'jug pa na// rig pa gnas lugs 'khor ba'i rgyu// skyed par byed pa chos nyid ma// rtsa ba nyams myong 'dzin pa yin// gnas lugs snying po wa nas drongs// zha 'a za byed stong pa'i dbyings// sku gsum mya ngan 'das pa nya// thugs rje gnas lugs shes rab shugs// sa ni 'gyur ba med par brtan// ha ni 'gag med snying po'i dbyings// skye ba med pas snying po aH// mgo 'dren bod bde skabs su 'byed// 'dzin pa mkhyen byed gcod pa dang// 'brel khyab sdud pa snying po'i grogs// snying po med pa gang zhig brjod// yi ge med pa srog snying gang// yig 'bru med pa gzugs snang ci// srog dang snying po'i gdams pa yin// srog ni gzugs la snying po ming// gzugs nas

gzung na snying pos bod// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ gsang ba sgra dang srog gi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje che// rdo rje hUM ste hUM zhes sgrogs// thig le nyag gcig man ngag ni// bsgom du ci yang med pa la// yengs pa med pa'i man ngag bstan// rdo rje 'phrul gyi snying po'i sku// rdo rje skye med 'gag med thugs// rdo rje bzhi bskor ma yengs bzlas// rdo rje rdo rje shub bu dang// gnod pa 'gog byed a tir bzlas// sems dpa'i sku gsal bla ma dran// rdo rje'i bzlas pa rang sor bzlas// rdo rje shub bu'i bzlas pa ni// so dang mchu ni mnyam sbyar la// lce yi rtse mos cung zad bskul// tshig gi sgra ni bskyung pa'i glu// rdo rje shub bu'i bzlas pa'o// 'gog pa dag gi bzlas pa ni// nad dang gdon ngos bzung ba las// stod 'phang smad bskyur bar nas gdon// bsreg gsad char dbab mchod par dbul// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags rnam rtog 'gog/ 'gyu dran 'dzin chags gang snang la// yod med gang 'dug ci 'dug brtags// nga dang snying po rang byung chos// gzugs med srog chod snang ba med// tshig med ming bral snying po rig/ a ni skye med bzlas pa'o// gsang sngags rig sngags gzungs sngags kun// gang bzlas snying po hUM gi rta// yi ge 'bru yi sgra ltar ro// chen po 'thug po ring po thung// drang po bzlog pa rnal ma rnams// kun kyang snying po hUM gi sgra// gsang bar bzlas dang 'brug ltar sgrogs// rang sor tshig gsal chod pa bzla// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ bzla lugs kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//// de nas ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig badzra sa twa khyod// ngo bo'i rgyud dang tshig gi rgyud// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po dang// lta ba phyogs dang bral ba'i chos// ma bris dkyil 'khor snang ba'i mchog/ dbang mchog snying po rang byung dbang// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags yengs med sgrogs// dam tshig 'khu 'phrigs spangs pa'i gdeng// spyod pa shugs 'byung tshul 'chos med// phrin las 'gro don rdzogs pa yi// gsang sngags snying po hUM gi rgyud// 'brel dang ma tshang med pa yin// yongs su rdzogs pas ma tshang med// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen bsgrub pa las// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// 'di ni a ti snying po'i rgyud// gsang sngags bstan pa dar ba'i dus// dus kyi snyigs ma las ngan byed// rgyal po mnga' bri dmangs kun rang dgar spyod// de dus nga yi rgyud 'di dar bar 'gyur// ma nyams gsang thub re dogs bral// grol bar 'gyur te the tshom med// chos kyi zong byed slob dpon 'phrag tshong byed// sdig la mi 'dzem tshul 'chos dge ba byed// mched kyi khrel med slob

dpon mnyes mi byed// dngos gsum rjes 'brel ngan song dmyal ba'i gnas// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi don bsdus pa dang dar dus kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//// kun byed ston pas bka' stsal pa// 'khor tshogs badzra sa twa khyod nyon cig/ snying po gang du gyur pas sangs rgyas thugs// rtsa ba 'dus pas sems can gzhi// myang 'das thugs la 'khor ba'i dbugs// gong du gyur dang gong na med// rtse mo zang thal rin chen tog/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs pa gcig/ sems can kun gyi yid du gnas// 'khor ba'i gsham du 'dus pa yin// 'gro drug khams gsum hUM gi skad// mi mthun pa dang ga la srid// stong pa sems kyi rang rtsal yin// rtse mo gar 'gyur rtsa ba gsham du 'dus// dus kyi tha mar snying po dar bar nges// gces pa'i man ngag bla med snying po'i rgyud// snyigs ma'i dus su chos 'di 'byung bar 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// de ltar chos 'di 'byung ba ni// byin gyis rlabs kyis 'byung mi 'byung// gang gi sa phyogs dar bar 'gyur// gang zag gang gis 'dzin pa lags// zhes zhus pas// rdo rje 'chang bas 'di skad gsungs// byin gyis rlabs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur// nga nyid sprul pa rdo rje sems// rdo rje 'chang ba bar ma khyod// khyod nyid sprul pa rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i ming la rdo rje'i sku// rgyal rigs o rgyan rdo rje 'chang// rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma des// sa 'dul bod yul rgyal po dang// blon po sprul sku gcig la gtod// de nas skal ldan rim brgyud nas// gsang sngags bka' 'chol dus su dar// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ chos kyi dar sa 'byung dus kyi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o//// yang ston pas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa'i tshogs// snying po chos min rang byung 'di// dper na nor bu rin chen 'dra// thams cad mi 'byung gang yang med// 'gyur ba med pas gser dang 'dra// gang ltar dpyad kyang snying po nyid// rang byung rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra// stong pa dngos por snang bar byed// sgyu ma mkhan gyi dpe dang 'dra// gcig las thams cad sprul par snang// rgya mtshor gza' skar shar ba 'dra// zab la ma 'dres kun gsal chos// nam mkhar sprin 'dus thog dang 'dra// dngos po'i rdzas kun rlag par byed// sman gyi rgyal po dze ta 'dra// gang la reg pa sman du 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'dra// log lta dgra bgegs 'dul bar byed// nam mkhar nyi ma shar ba 'dra// ma rig sdig sgrib sbyong ba'o// sman gyi rgyal po ga bur 'dra// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par che// thang khad mnyam po'i chu dang 'dra// gang dang gang yang

gdul bya'i chos// snying po 'di ni kun gyi las// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod ston// 'di ni srung ba bla na med// hUM brjod dpa' bo gzhan gyis min// hUM bsgom rdo rje 'jig 'dral med// hUM rtogs nam mkha' gcad du med// dri chen dri chu byang sems bzang// gla ba tshil chen gu gul dang// rta bon mu zi bsku zhing brtag/ sman drug bu+u ram ka ra ni// tsha grang gnyis la sbyar zhing btang// rtsa chu gnyis kyis nad ngos bzung// srin bya 'ug pa pho rog mig/ mig mthong gdon ngos bzung ba'i rdzas// gu gul rta bon tshil chen ni// gdon bsreg yi dwags kha chings rdzas// 'o ma can dang tsher ma can// sbyin bsreg zhi drag gnyis kyi rdzas// ro g.yam thod pa ming dang gzugs// rgya gram dpa' bo bco lngas bris// mnan pa rdo rje kha gnon rdzas// khrag dang dug sna sngo dang chu// lo thog rlung la bskur pa'i rdzas// nyung dkar nyung nag mda' phur khrag/ srog la zor thun gsad pa'i rdzas// hUM bsgom hUM brjod me dpung mtshon// thog ris sdigs mdzub ser ba bzlog/ ces gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad zhus// ston pas gsungs pa'i rgyud 'di la// mtshan du ji skad gzung bar bgyi// 'khor tshogs 'di la nges par gsung// zhes zhus pas// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// ngas bshad snying po don gyi rgyud// sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'dus pa'i chos// dgongs pa 'dus pa'i rgyud du zung// gsang ba'i snying po chos min ston// gsang ba snying po'i rgyud du zung// rang byung snying po rdo rje ston// rang byung snying po'i rgyud du zung// 'og min gnas kyi dang por gsungs// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud du zung// zhes gsungs nas bka' stsal pa// gsang sngags 'di bab chol la spyod// dam tshig nyams pa'i chos byed kun// na rag yi dwags dkrugs par shog/ mi bzad srin po bdud mo yis// grogs dang bu tsha 'khor du shog/ yid 'ong grogs dang bral bar shog/ ming btags lha srin sde brgyad kyis// rtag tu 'tshe zhing snying 'byin shog/ byams pa'i gnyen med mi rnams kun// rtag tu dgra yi las byed shog/ bu dang slob bu bslabs 'gying ste// srin bya'i skad bzhin snyan med shog/ 'byung ba 'khrugs pas 'du ba'i nad// rtag tu lus la 'byung bar shog/ gdug pa klu dang dgras yar dang// rtag tu lus sems bde med shog/ bla ma mnyes byed lus srog nor// rig pa dam tshig gtsang mar bsrung// 'khor drug yang phyir mi ldog par// dge spyod grogs rnyed 'khor rnyed shog/ lha srin 'khor byed bar chad sel bar shog/ mgo nag byams nas rgyal po'i bka' bzhin shog/ nad med lus bde nyams myong rang 'bar shog/ klu 'go bsod nams dge rgyas shog/ ces gsungs

so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ dpe dang srung rdzas rgyud mtshan smon lam gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//// de nas ston pa kun byed rdo rje 'chang// 'od gsal kha dog snying po'i 'od// hUM las kha dog lngar bstan nas// rdo rje 'chang ba dang po'i sku ru bzhugs// hUM las ha 'byung a ru rtogs// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa' 'khor dang/ mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje drag mo la sogs pa rigs lnga'i mkha' 'gro ma dang/ rdo rje rigs kyi lha brgya stong gis/ me tog dang mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing mngon par bstod pa/ ston pa'i ston pa rdo rje 'chang// kun tu bzang po kun byed sku// snying po'i chos 'chang rdo rje'i thugs// snying po skye med sku la bstod// 'dus pa'i 'khor la rgyud bshad ngo mtshar che// rang byung snying po hUM de rdo rje'i rgyud// gsang ba mngon du ston pa man ngag chos// 'khor tshogs 'di la gnang ba yi rang ngo// zhes gsungs so// ston pa nyid mya ngan las 'das so// de nas rdo rje sems dpas// kye ma kyi hud kyi hud ces gsungs shing// mi snang mi 'khor rdo rje 'chang// phyir mi ldog pa kun tu bzang// snying po chos dbyings rdo rje'i sku// byin gyis rlabs kyis gzung bar zhu// zhes gsungs nas rgyud 'di bsdus nas sprul pa'i sku pad+ma 'byung gnas la gsungs so// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud las/ rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o//// rdo rje yang rtse'i rgyud rdzogs so//// rgya gar skad du// badzra pra ke tu tan+t+ra nA ma// bod skad du// rdo rje yang tog gi rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'chang chen po rang rig pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// ston pa rdo rje 'chang chen sku// chos dbyings snying po rang byung gnas// snga phyi med pa snying po'i dus// rang byung sprul pa nyid kyi 'khor// rang byung snying po rtogs pa'i chos// gcig las thams cad 'byung bar rtogs// yang dang bral ba'i thig le ni// cir yang yin pa thams cad grol// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' dang// rdo rje dbyings kyi mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje drag mo nyi zla'i gdong// sems dpa' rnal 'byor la sogs kyis// ston pa nyid la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// snying po'i nyi zla gsal ba de// 'khrul pa log ltas 'gro drug bsgribs// thugs rjes snying po mi sel ba// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ci// zhes zhus pas// de nas kun bzang rdo rje 'chang// byin gyis rlabs kyis 'khor rnams la// chos sku'i snying po skur bzhengs nas// rang byung snying po kun gyi gzhi// 'khor tshogs khyed la legs par bstan// de bzhin nyid la ming med de// 'khor ba'i sems can drangs pa'i phyir// tshig lam rkyen gyis mtshon te bstan// zhes gsungs

so// rdo rje yang tog gi rgyud las/ phun sum tshogs pa zhus lan gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang// snying po'i don 'di ji lta bu// zhes zhus pas// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// snying po lhun grub kun gyi gzhi// rang byung du ma snying po'i rtsal// nga ni rang byung snying po yin// thams cad nga las byung ba yin// nor bu rin chen yon tan 'dra// nga ni snying po kun gyi gzhi/ nga rtogs pas ni grol ba de// chos sku yul med phyogs dang bral// yul snang sangs pas rtogs pa rgyas// ming tshogs grol bas ye shes rgyas// skyes 'gyur ming med nga yi sku// nyi ma'i snying po 'od zer 'byung// chos sku'i snying po thugs rje 'byung// byin gyis brlab phyir snang ba yin// nga nyid sprul pa rdo rje sems// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' dang// de nyid sprul pa thub pa drug/ 'gro drug sems can rnams la snang// ma rig 'khrul pa rigs drug nga// bde gshegs snying po 'khor ba'i rgyu// 'gro drug sems can snying pos khyab// nga las 'byung ba ma shes 'khrul// sa chu me rlung snod rten dang// nam mkhas khyab pa'i rang byung nga// gling bzhi gling phran ri rab dang// snod bcud snang ba gzung 'dzin nga// nga ni snying po hUM gi rtsal// 'khor 'das gnyis ka nga yi rtsal// 'gag pa med pas gnyis ka nga// rigs lnga sangs rgyas nga yi sku// de yi yul lnga nga yi gdangs// ye shes rnam lnga nga yi rtogs// spyan lnga nga rang mthong bas spyan// rigs lnga sku lnga ye shes nga// hUM las 'og min sems dpar snang// rigs drug thub drug gdul bya nga// dug lnga phung po 'byung lnga nga// phyogs lnga 'dre lnga sde brgyad nga// phyogs skyong rgyu skar gza' brgyad nga// lha klu nor bu rin chen nga// nad lnga lo zla zhag grangs nga// phyogs lnga kha dog dbang po nga// don snying sha rus yan lag nga// da ni don gyi snying po hUM// gzhi rtags kun gyi dbugs dang skad// gzhi ni snying po chos kyi dbyings// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ chos nyid 'byung sa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang// kye kye ston pa kun tu bzang// de ltar chos nyid snying po 'di// 'khor 'das gyes pa ji lta bu// de yi dus 'di gang las byung// zhes gsol pas// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro khyod// snying po gnyis med gzhi ma las// rang byung rang rlung 'gag pa med// snying po 'gag med ha rlung rtsal// de nyid rang gdangs 'od du 'byung// snying po hUM gi rang byung yin// kha dog sna tshogs gzhal ltar gsal// 'gyu dran

'dzin chags rnam shes dengs// 'od mthong de rang rang 'byung rtogs// phar bltas pas ni tshur la gsal// ye shes snying po 'khrul rtsa chod// srog la mi 'khor tshig mi dgos// rang byung ye shes snying po grol// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags bag chags med// dge ba ma bsags sangs rgyas ngas// chos min snying po chos kyi sku// srog snying la shan de dus phye// dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyu med pa// rang byung snying po kha dog las// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags sgyu mar snang// rang byung ma rtogs bag ma chags// sgyu ma ma chags chags sdang med// dug lnga ma rgyas ye ma shes// sgyu ma stong pa rgya yis thebs// khyod nyid sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpar snang// rigs lnga sku lnga bar ma dor// yar gzigs mar mthong so mtshams las// sgyu ma rang grol snying po rtogs// rdo rje sems dpar chos sku yin// sgyu ma sgyu mar spyod pas longs sku yin// sgyu ma 'gag med cir yang ston// sprul sku thub drug cir yang ston// rdo rje 'chang ba tha ma des// thugs rjes dbang po theg pa rim// blo dang sbyar te snying po ston// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khor 'das 'khrul pa gyes pa las sku gsum sangs rgyas lugs kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yang// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// sku gsum de ltar sangs rgyas na// 'gro drug khams gsum sems can 'di// ci las 'khor ba ji ltar lags// zhes gsol pas// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// snying po rang byung 'od du shar// snying po'i rang rtsal rang byung yin// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags bag tu chags// gzung 'dzin dug lnga chags sdang gis// srog dang snying po gnyis su 'khor// sangs rgyas ye shes 'khor ba'i skyon// nyon mongs rang gis rang bcings byung// dper na srin gyi bal rlangs des// srin rang yan lag dbang po bcings// bde ba 'dod pas sdug bsngal byung// sdig pa ma bsags 'khor bar 'khor// las dang las kyi 'bras bu byung// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags bzhi yi sgrogs// phung po khams dang skye mched brtas// mtho ris ngan song dge sdig las// bde gshegs snying po 'khor ba'i rgyu// lus dang sems gnyis rtag tu sbyong// dgra gnyen gnyis kyi las la spyod// snying po rang byung ma rtogs pas// snod bcud gnyis su 'dzin pa brtas// hUM nyid snying po rang byung 'di// goms rtogs ngo shes 'dris gnad gcun// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sems can 'khrul tshul gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// srog snying gnyis la 'khor ba yi// ma rig 'gro ba nyon re mongs// snying po'i don (25)

la ji ltar sbyar// 'gro ba'i gnas nas gang du bsgral// zhes gsol pas// rdo rje 'chang bas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ma rig mig 'byed gdams pa'i sa// rdza bcag nang gi mar me bzhin// snying po rang byung rang rig 'di// yul med yul du 'dod pas rdza lta bu// snying po rang chas mar me 'dra// rang la yod de rang gis bsgrib// gzugs phung shig dang rang byung mthong// yul snang gzir dang rang byung 'char// 'gyu dran gtems dang rang byung mthong// 'dzin chags spongs dang rang byung shes// 'gyu dran ma bu'i gdams ngag ni// 'gyu ba ha rtsal rang byung rlung// kyus kyi 'gyus pas ha rtsal zin// 'gyu ba'i rta la dran pa'i srab// glang chen lcags kyus bsgyur ba 'dra// rta rgod srab kyis btul ba yin// 'gyu ba dran pas btul pa yin// dran pa sangs pa'i ye shes ni// 'gyu ba'i rtsal gyis dran pa grol// yul snang sangs pa'i rang byung nyams// dran pas zin pa'i ting 'dzin nyams// chu yis chu ded rgya mtsho'i klong// nyams las 'das pa'i ye shes yin// 'gyu dran sangs na nyams las 'das// 'dzin pa gang na gang la gtad// gcig la las su rung bar gyis// chags pa sangs pa'i rang nyams yin// yul rten bral ba'i rang byung nyams// dran pas 'gyu ba grol te rtse chod nyams// 'dzin pa chags pas bltas te rtse chod nyams// bu gnad dran pa che ste ma yi nyams// ma gnad 'dzin pa'i gnad de rang byung nyams// rlung gnad 'gyu ba dran pas so// dran gnad 'dzin pa chags pa gang yang med// ri dwags khyis ded thar sa med// ta la mgo bcad skye ba med// ces gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ 'khrul pa rtsad bcad kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang// ston pa nyid la 'di skad zhus// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// snying po bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bsnyen bsgrub phrin las dam tshig dang// mchod pa byin rlabs gsang sngags gang// lta spyod dbang dang ting nge 'dzin// bsgrub pa khyad par grub mtha' rnams// 'khor tshogs nyid la gsung bar zhu// zhes gsol pas// rdo rje 'chang gis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' dang// rdo rje drag mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// de la gdung bzhi phrin las bzhi// sngags kyi yan lag dam tshig gsum// mchod pa'i bye brag bsgrub pa yi// khyad par grub mtha'i snying po bstan// zhes gsungs so// yang bka' stsal pa// rjes 'jug phrin las gzhung bsrangs te// dpa' bo gcig pa'i gzhung 'jug na// dur khrod brag gi ri khrod dam// grog po lung stong nags kyi gseb// dben gnas yid dang 'thad ba ru// lha 'dre gdug pa mi med der// bla ma yi dam maN+Dal

dang// chos skyong maN+Dal legs bshams la// chu gtor gser skyems dkar gtor btang// bden pa bdar zhing dam tshig dbog/ spang skong bklags shing ci rigs brjod// tho gzug mtshams bcad phyi nang bar// bla ma yi dam skyabs gsol bas// ci 'byor yo byad byin gyis brlab// gtor tshogs dza gad rak+ta dgod// tshe bum mchod rdzas ci 'byor dgram// de nas rnal 'byor can de yis// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshams gcod bya// lha dang bla mar mjal phyag 'tshal// byin dbab rtags gdab dam bca' bya// phyi bshags nang bshags gsang bshags bya// dpa' bos mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum bsgom// spyan drangs phyag 'tshal bzhugs su gsol// mchod 'bul sman gtor rak+ta dang// longs spyod tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor// tshul dang mthun phyir dngos grub blang// mchod bsham sbyor sgrol phrin las bya// 'jig rten mchod cing gtor ma gtong// dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing rnal 'byor bya// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ phrin las gzhung gi le'u ste drug pa'o//// de nas rdo rje sems dpas yang// rdo rje 'chang la 'di skad gsol// kye kye ston pa rdo rje 'chang// rmongs pa gsar bu grol phyir du// gzhung ltar bsgrub pa'i khyad par gsung// zhes gsol pas// nyon cig rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// dpa' bo gcig pa'i rnal 'byor des// sny-ing po rang byung gsal byas te// sems dpa' rnam gsum sku yi mtshams// rang byung snying po thugs kyi mtshams// hUM zhes brjod pa gsung gi mtshams// gzhi yi hUM las spro zhing bsdu// 'di skad tshig gis gsal de gdab// hUM steng yang hUM gi rang bzhin la// 'og kyang hUM gi rang bzhin 'og/ phyogs mtshams hUM gis rab tu gang// rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pas gtams// mtshon cha sna tshogs gshog pa can// sku yi mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ hUM steng yang hUM gi rang bzhin la// 'og kyang hUM gi rang bzhin 'og/ phyogs mtshams hUM gis gtams pa la// thams cad yig 'bru sngags kyi sgra// gsung gi mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ hUM sku gsum snying po rang byung hUM// rnam par rtog pa nga rang hUM// nga rang hUM du thams cad gcig/ mi rtog snying po'i mtshams las ma 'da' zhig/ hUM snying po rang 'byung bla ma lha// rang byung snying po'i sgo phyes shig/ hUM mos shing dngas pa'i dam tshig gis/ gnyis su med par phyag 'tshal lo// hUM lta ba hUM du ma rtogs shing// yengs pas snying po sgom yun thung// brtson 'grus bsgrub pa'i gzhung ma tshugs// ma rig rang ma rtogs pa bshags// de nas gtor ma dza gad khrag/ 'byor ba'i tshogs dang mchod rdzas rnams// hUM brjod 'od zhu spro bsdu

yis// phyi nang gsum du byin gyis brlabs// rig 'dzin la sogs byin dbab dang// yi dam mkha' 'gro byin dbab bya// rnal 'byor brtag tshe khrag tshil byug/ dam bcas bla ma lha dang bdag/ 'gro don byed par sems pa bskyed// dam bsre sems bskyed sdom pa gzung// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sngon 'gro mtshams kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//// de nas yang bka' stsal pa// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// gzhung spyod dam gtsang skyes bu des// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu yi ting 'dzin bsgom par bya// ngo bo nges tshig dbye ba des// de bzhin nyid dang kun tu snang// rgyu yi ting 'dzin rnam gsum sbyar// sems dpa' rnam gsum gsal phyir ro// zad sar bskyal ba gdams ngag yin// de don gsal gdab 'di skad brjod// hUM ma nor ma bcos snying po nyid// rgyu rkyen skye med stong pa hUM// hUM yongs la khyab pas dbri bkol med// 'dod pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' hUM// hUM rang byung snying po'i klong yangs nas// thams cad bskyed par rang byung hUM// hUM las b+h+ruM 'phros 'og min gnas// phyi med nang med gzhal yas khang// hUM thabs dang shes rab skyon med steng// mi 'jigs 'dul ba dregs pa'i gdan// hUM rang byung snying po 'phrul gyi sku// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// gang snang phrin las yi dam lha// hUM 'og min chos dbyings snying po'i mkha'// rdo rje 'chang chen rdo rje'i rigs// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i 'khor// 'gro ba'i don la gshegs su gsol// hUM snying po chos sku rang byung lha// rdo rje 'chang dang rin chen pad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro karma mkha' 'gro dang// phyag 'tshal lha la skyabs su mchi// hUM sems can nyi zla pad+ma'i steng// rdo rje de bzhin rin chen pad// karma rigs kyi yum dang bcas// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// hUM rang byung gdod nas dag pa ste// rtsa brgyad snying po nyid kyi smin// bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba dang// mkha' 'gro sprul pa'i tshogs la 'bul// thugs rjes brtser dgongs dbang dang dngos grub stsol// hUM gu ru badzra a mr-i ta khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM oM/ hUM hUM hUM AH/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phyi nang gsang gsum tshogs kyi las// phyi yi mchod pa rin po che// 'dod yon dbang po lnga por 'bul// gzugs sgra ro sogs mchod par bzhes// hUM nang gi mchod pa rin po che// dbang po rnam shes rnam shes yul// thugs dam skong gyur rin po che// mthong snang dag par bzhes su gsol// hUM gsang ba'i mchod pa rin po che// 'gyus dang dran dang 'dzin dang chags// srog dang snying po sbyor sgrol 'di// snying po skye 'gag med par bzhes// hUM snod kyi 'jig rten gtor ma'i snod// bcud kyi sems can bcud dang

khrag/ 'dod yon gtor ma tshogs su 'bul// bdud rtsi 'dod yon mchod pa bzhes// hUM lus kyi 'jig rten gtor ma'i snod// sha khrag rus pa tshil bu rkang// dbugs chen gtor ma sman rag tshogs// phung po yan lag mchod pa bzhes// hUM gsang ba dbang po yul drug snod// rnam shes dbang po 'gyu dran 'dzin// chags pa gtor ma rak+ta khrag/ bdud rtsi tshogs chen mchod pa bzhes// hUM gu ru ba ling ta khA hi/ hUM badzra ba ling ta khA hi/ hUM rak+ta khA hi/ hUM a mr-i ta khA hi/ hUM tsit+ta khA hi/ hUM go ro tsa na khA hi/ hUM ma hA mAM sa khA hi/ hUM ba su ta khA hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ hi hi hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ ye nas snying po chos kyi sku// gdod nas skye 'gag rang byung hUM// thams cad rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku// 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// hUM rang byung skye med drang po'i gsung// thams cad gsung du sgrogs mdzad hUM// snying po rtsa sngags mdo rgyud mchog/ kun kyang gdams par sgrogs la bstod// hUM nyag gcig zang thal chos las 'das// gcig tu mi rtog du ma med// 'gyu dran med par 'dzin chags med// gnyis med rdo rje'i thugs la bstod// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ gzhung mchod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// de nas rjes 'jug slob ma la// gsang sngags hUM gi dbang bskur bya// sku gsung thugs kyi dbang dang ni// gtor ma zhal zas tshogs dang phud// rak+ta mar me tshe yi dbang// rdzas dang d+ha ma chags shing dbang// lta sgom spyod pa'i dbang bskur bya// rdo rje rgyal po rjes 'jug kyis// zhus gnang dbang yon gdams pa bstan// dang po dbang la 'jug tsa na// dkyil 'khor dbang rdzas lta ba zhu// yon 'bul dbang bskur gdams pa zhu// de don zhu ba 'di skad gsol// hUM bde chen snying po'i pho brang du// thugs rjes gnang 'tshal bstan par zhu// bdag lta nyon mongs snying rje la// ma rig mig 'byed gsal bar zhu// sngon gyi mig mkhan rgyal po yis// ma rig ling tog bsal bar zhu// 'jug khrid gdams pa chos bstan hUM// sbas pa'i man ngag bstan par zhu// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod kyis// bla ma rdo rje'i bka' drin gyis// gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor ltos// hUM rang byung snying po'i dkyil 'khor 'di// gcig bltas pas ni thams cad mthong// rig pa'i me tog 'di dor la// mig 'di dbye yis legs par ltos// hUM badzra pra we shA ya phaT// thugs kyi maN+Dal pho brang ngo// de nas rigs kyi bu de la// rdo rje rgyal po'i dbang bskur bya// hUM gtor ma ye shes phyag rgya che// gang mos lha ru byin brlabs nas// skal ldan khyod la dbang bskur bas// snying po hUM don rtogs par shog/ hUM hUM hUM ba liM dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsA

mi hUM// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// dza gad a mr-i ta yi dbang bskur bas// 'gro ba'i nad sel ye shes lnga// 'gro ba 'bangs su 'du bar shog/ hUM a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi hUM// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// dmar chen rak+tas dbang bskur bas// thugs rje chags pa rang grol nas// shes rab rang byung me 'bar te// mkha' 'gro dbang du 'du bar shog/ hUM rak+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi hUM// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// zhal zas tshogs kyi dbang bskur pas// thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yi// bza' btung longs spyod tshogs rdzogs shog/ hUM b+hun dza a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// zhun mar snang bas dbang bskur bas// rang gsal snying po rang rig sgron// ye shes rang 'byung rang snang shog/ hUM A lo ke ab+hi Shiny+tsa mi// hUM skal ldan rigs kyi bu khyod la// snying po mi 'gyur tshe yi dbang bskur bas// bar chod rkyen med tshe dang dbang thang rgyas// rdo rje hUM gi tshe dbang thob par shog/ hUM badzra A yu She a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ hUM badzra ab+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ hUM bud+d+ha a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ hUM rat+na trAM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ hUM pad+ma d+h+r-i ka a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ hUM karma hA a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ de ni sku gsung thugs kyi dbang// rig pa 'dzin la dbang bskur gyis// hUM phyag rgya rang byung 'phrul gyi sku// bden pa rang byung hUM gi sngags// ting 'dzin snying po rang byung hUM// skye med sku gsung thugs su shog/ oM AHhUM dz+nyA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// hUM mtha' 'bral ma yengs rgyun du spyod// mi 'phrigs mi rtsol re dogs med// rdo rje 'chang ba'i chos nyid ni// skal ldan khyod kyis rtogs par shog/ hUM d+harma d+hA tu a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// hUM rig pa rtogs pa rang gi dbang// rang chas snying po sdig sgrib grol// srog snying yul ming gnyis las grol// chos min snying po rtogs par shog/ hUM dz+nyA ba d+h-Ika a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// hUM chos rnams thams cad gzhi po'i hUM// brda rtags bstan pas de nyid rig/ rang byung 'gyu drin lam du slongs// 'dzin chags rang grol 'bras bu hUM// des na 'chad pa'i dbang bskur bya// hUM rdo rje 'chang ba rigs kyi bu// snying po 'gro ba yongs la khyab// de nyid rang byung hUM du gnas// de nyid khyod kyis tshig rgyud ston// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// phrin las bcol ba'i rim pa ni// dpa' bo gcig pa'i cha lag ste// hUM rdo rje 'chang ba nga yi sku// rdo rje zhi khro nga las byung// lha mo mdzes ma sna tshogs dang// gtum chen mtshon thogs nga nyid hUM// hUM las gyur pa bde chen hUM// rbad phaTaHhUM ya yang byung dang b+h+yo yi dzaH/ ru lu ki la ya yang nga// snying po thams cad nga yi sngags// hUM zhi

'gyur tshe dang dbang thang rgyas// dbang sdud thams cad rlag par byed// srog snying gzir ba dgra dang bgegs// ming med srog dang bral bar mdzod// hUM raM las me byung me chen lnga// dug lnga 'dre lnga'i phung po bsreg/ sna tshogs dmigs te 'od kyis bsreg/ rang byung me ni nga rang hUM// hUM khaM las chu byung rgya mtsho'i klong// klung chen klung phran sa bdag gnyan// nyon mongs snang min sgrib pa 'khru// rang byung chu rdul nga rang hUM/ hUM yaM las rlung byung dang po'i rlung// rgyu ba rlung chen spro bsdu rlung// snang med rang byung dngos med hUM// hUM ri rab chen po dpa' bo hUM// rab brtan rdo rje rgya gram gser// lcags ri pho brang lha yi 'og/ khro bo chen po 'khor bcas hUM// hUM rdo rje phur pa mtshon cha hUM// nyung dkar nyung nag ske tshe rdo// khrag dang dug kun thun zor dpal// mA ra ya dang snying po hUM// de nas gtor ma 'khor la mchod// phud dang rak+ta spo bzhin du// hUM mkha' 'gro'i rigs sogs rnal 'byor ma// skyes bu ging dang ging phran tshogs// dbang phyug nyi shu bran mo brgyad// ma bdun sring bzhi pho nya rnams// 'bar ma brtan ma mtha' skyong hUM// hUM bka' yi gtor ma 'di bzhes la// gal te gtor ma ma blangs na// sngon gyi dam bca' 'gal la re// nyams pa'i chad pa byung nga re// de bas gtor ma 'di longs la// dam tshig skyongs shig 'gal byed sgrol// de nas dngos grub blang dang gtor ba'o// rbad dang gtor ma gta' ru bzung ba'o// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ phrin las yongs su mdzad pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig badzra mkha' 'gro ma// 'dzab 'di ma yengs snying po bzla// hUM hUM b+hUM badzra hU~M/ oM bud+d+ha hUM hUM hUM/ oM pad+ma hUM hUM hUM/ swA rat+na hUM hUM hUM/ hA karma hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM badzra ta gi ni hUM te te te na hUM/ hUM hUM hUM rat+na ta ki ni hUM te te te na hUM/ hUM hUM hUM pad+ma ta ki ni hUM te te te na hUM/ hUM hUM hUM karma ta ki ni hUM te te te na hUM/ hUM hUM hUM bud+d+ha ta ki ni hUM te te te na hUM/ skabs su pho mo'i snying po bzlas/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM AHhUM hUM/ gcig dang gsum dang lnga yi sngags// dus med rgyun du bzlas pa yin// gces pa'i gsang sngags snying po'o// sngags kyi grong khyer sbrel pa ni// dpa' bo rang byung 'di ltar gdags// hUM dang ri rab can du sbrel// phaTaHdang rlung spud can du sbrel// rbad dang gri gug can du sbrel/ yaM dang mtshon cha can du sprel// b+h+yo dang g.yab dar can du sbrel// dzaHdang lcags kyu can du sprel// ri bo chen po'i mgul lam rtser// mnan dang sbrel te rgya gram mo// gdug pa tsher ma 'o ma can// rno dpal raM dang sbrel pa'o// nyung dkar rdo lcags khrag thun dang// mA ra ya b+h+yo thun sbrel ba ni// las kha rdzogs pa'i hUM skor ro// kA ya wAkra

dang tsit+ta hUM// dngos grub dbang dang A li sbrel// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje yang tog snying po'i rgyud las/ sngags dang sbrel so'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nyon cig sems dpa' mkha' 'gro ma// dbab bcad sbyor ba rdzogs par gyis// rang byung snying po hUM la bya// 'di ni phrin las yongs kyi rgyud// rtsa ba nor bu rin chen no// 'gyu dran 'dzin chags las kyi mtha'// rdo rje yang tog las kyi khrigs// lag len dmar byang yang tog rgyud// kun dang 'brel pa snying po'i rgyud// rtsa ba thabs kyi rgyud du zung// 'di ni mjug tu lag tu gtad// des kyang snying dang mig tu rtsis// sbas pa'i snying po gsang dbang 'di// dam tshig gzhung bsrang yul khams dgra// bdag gis ma nyes pham gsum blangs// bstan pa 'jig na las 'di bya// snying po 'phrul gyi sku bsgom la// ngag kyang mi bsdad hUM drag bgrang// yid kyang mi bsdad pho nya bsgom// yul khams gsal ba byas la dbang// mdze thod sha khrag sngo sna tshogs// bong nga nyung dkar mu zi nag/ gu gul rabs chad gri bo'i khrag/ hUM nA ga tsa pa ni rA hu la sa ha/ hUM nA ga tsa ba ni rA hu la phrom phrom/ hUM nA ga tsa ba ni rA hu la chu dril phrom phob phob/ yul khams phung bar the tshom med// zhag brgyad bsnyen la bzhi ru bsgrub// zhag gsum las sbyor dbab pa'i las// gtor ma 'od sa'i dkyil du bskyal// khrag dang nyung dkar 'od mtha' bskor// bong nga mu zi gu gul gyis// yul lha ser srung srung ma mnol// thod pa brdab la khrag kyang gtor// ri rtser phyin la gos brdab thod pa bsgril// rgya 'jug ldog par shes par gyis// lha srin kun la gtor ma thong// 'dis ni thams cad cham la phebs// zhes gsungs so// de nas bsrung ba'i las bya na// dpa' bo gcig pa'i skur gsal te// rdo rje 'chad pa khro chen des// seng ldeng zhir rtsib hUM bris la// gang dmigs yul phyogs bskor bar bya// rdo rje khro bos gtams bsam la// yul sde la
